sngon sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du zhugs pa yin no/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje/ nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi snying po dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug gang na ba der dong ste lhags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nor bu rin po che chen po de yang mngon par dgab par phul lo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs

pas gcal du bkram pa/ mchod pa'i don du rab tu bkod nas rang gi stan la 'dug go/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa don yod pa dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu gsal ba'i 'od zer

zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa gang gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu gdugs kyi rnam pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa kun tu gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa

byung ngo / /'od zer sna tshogs pa'i snang ba des kyang nam mkha'i mthil du rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po sna tshogs pa bstan to/ /'od zer gyi snang ba re res kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

dgu bcu rtsa dgu rab tu bstan no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba'i gzungs

kyi dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya 'di bshad pa 'di legs so legs so/ /'jig rten las 'das pa shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar byed pa'i lam/ chos kyi rnam 'phrul 'bar bar

byed pa/ chos kyi rgyal mtshan sgreng bar byed pa/ chos kyi dung 'bud par byed pa/ bdud bzhi'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus gnon par byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad rab tu rdzogs

par byed pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis gnon par byed pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' pha rol gnon par byed pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rab tu rdzogs par byed pa'o/ /'di ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sgom par byed pa'o/ /'di ni lam

rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi lam du 'chags par byed pa/ bsam pa rab tu nyams pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ ngan song du 'gro bar rgyu ba rnams kyi bde 'gro'i lam du 'gro bar byed pa/ 'di ni byang chub chen po'i sa bon dang / 'bras bu rab tu ston par

byed pa'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /sems can dag pa 'jig rten las 'das pa khyad par du 'phags pa rnam par thar

ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga shod cig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das

kyi spyan snga nas bskul ba thob nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor gyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga dang / sgrub thabs gsungs so/ /gnas bzang sa gzhi dge ba dang / /sa gzhi gtsang zhing ne'u gsing la/ /ljon shing

me tog 'bras bus khyab/ /me tog 'khri shing 'gram dang ni/ /sa gzhi mnyen la dag pa dang / /gang du chu bo 'bab pa dang / /gzi brjid ldan zhing yid dga' ba/ /sa gzhi sems ni dga' bar 'os/ /yid kyi shing rta rgyas byed cing / /go skabs legs par

gnas pa dang / /shin tu dag cing thun tshags bral/ /rus pa gseg ma gyo mo dang / /phub ma sol ba yongs su spangs/ /gtsang zhing gtsang la legs dag pa'i/ /sa gzhi yongs su zlum pa der/ /mkhas pas rgyar ni gzings tshad du/ /gzhal nas shin tu rnam 'byes

shing / /gtsang zhing mnyen la 'jam par phye/ /gnas der dkyil 'khor legs par bsgrubs/ /sangs rgyas byang chub bla na med/ /'jig rten las 'das khyad 'phags par/ /de bzhin gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs/ /sa yi cha las dpangs su ni/ /mi gang

tshad du brko bar bya/ /gzungs dang dkyil 'khor dmar po'am/ /yang na gur gum kha dog dang / /sa rdul dkar po snum pa ni/ /mar sar 'dra ba 'jam pa yin/ /sa yi khyad par dbye ba de/ /de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bsngags/ /byang chub snying po sa der

mtshungs/ /ring bsrel bzhugs pa'i mchod rten dang / /de ni mtshungs par gyur pa yin/ /brkos pa'i nang du mkhas pa yis/ /slar yang sa de dgang bar bya/ /ji srid dong bu mnyam par gang / /de ni dkyil 'khor yang dag pa'o/ /nyung dang lhag pa bsngags pa

min/ /'dir ni 'grub pa med par bstan/ /khru ni sum cu rtsa gnyis tshad/ /mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig dag gdab/ /yang na khru ni bcu drug dang / /yang na khru ni bco lngar bya/ /mnyam zhing grwa bzhir legs par dbye/ /ba yi lci ba dag dang ni/ /sa dang bsres

te bsku bya ba/ /shin tu zhen par bsdig pa dang / /'jam zhing mnyen par bya ba yin/ /de la dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa/ /sna tshogs tshon gyis kun tu dbye/ /sgo bzhi rnam par 'byes pa dang / /rta babs bzhi dang ldan par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi snying po ni/ /

rnam par phye ste gru bzhi tshad/ /khru gsum yang na khru bzhi ni/ /thig skud tshon gyis rnam par dbye/ /nang gi thig ni tshad dag tu/ /mdung rtse gsum pa dag dang ni/ /nor bu rin chen sna tshogs bya/ /bar gyi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /pad+ma dang ni rdo rje dag /kun tu bri bar

bya ba yin/ /phyi yi thig gi tshad dag tu/ /rdo rje rnam pa'i stegs bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhal med khang / /stegs bu dag kyang bri bar bya/ /pad+ma'i dbus su gzhal med khang / /gzhal yas khang pa gnas par bya/ /dkyil 'khor dbus kyi pad+ma la/ /

rnam par snang mdzad thub pa bya/ /g.yon du 'ong ni dpag med pa/ /g.yas phyogs su ni de bzhin gshegs/ /shAkya'i rgyal po dag dang ni/ /don yod rgyal po 'jig rten gyi/ /dbang phyug mgon la mngon sum du/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba ni/ /phyag bzhi par ni

bya ba yin/ /phyag gnyis kyis ni sna tshogs pa'i/ /me tog rnams ni 'chang ba dang / /rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bya/ /'od dpag med pa'i mdun du ni/ /khro bo'i rgyal bo phyag bzhi ba/ /btud de thal mo sbyor ba dang / /lha rdzas me tog sna tshogs pa/ /lag pa

gnyis na thogs pa dang / /sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan par bya/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor legs brgyan pa/ /sna tshogs dar gyis mdzes par bya/ /don yod zhags pa'i phyag rgya che/ /pad+ma gdan dang rnam rgyan pa/ /'bar ba'i nang na yod par bya/ /grwa bzhir dag ni

byas na ni/ /gnyis kyi bar gyi cha bzhi ste/ /dbus kyi gnas su 'jigs med pa/ /shar gyi gnas su gnas pa ni/ /lha mo sgrol ma rnam par brgyan/ /g.yas kyi gnas su gnas pa ni/ /gos dkar mo ni rnam par brgyan/ /nub kyi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /

lha mo dkar mo rnam par brgyan/ /byang gi gnas na gnas pa ni/ /lha mo pad+ma mdzes dga' brgyan/ /dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su/ /rgyal chen bzhi ni gzhag par bya/ /bar gyi gnas su gzhag pa ni/ /ral pa gcig pa gtum mo shar/ /nub tu pho nya bzhin sgyur

ma/ /g.yas phyogs su ni bzhin sgyur ma/ /rdo rje lcags sgrog bya ba yin/ /byang du srin mo khro gnyer gdong / /kun kyang me dbus 'jigs pa med/ /dkyil 'khor dbus su dgod pa bzhin/ /phyi rol thig le pad+mo'i phreng / /rdo rje rtse gsum gzhag pa ni/ /kun tu 'bar

ba phreng bar bcas/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /bri bya rtag dang phyag rgya dang / /lha ni dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug gshin rje dang / /chu lha dbang po lus ngan po/ /dbang sgyur dga' ldan gnas dag gi/ /lha nas 'og min gnas kyi bar/ /

lha rnams bri bar bya ba yin/ /sum cu rtsa gsum lha rnams dang / /rtags ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /kun kyang pad+mo'i gdan la gnas/ /de bzhin chos kyi 'khor lo dang / /rdo rje rtse lnga rdo rje dang / /zhags pa dang ni dgra sta dang / /legs mthong 'khor lo de bzhin no/ /mdung

rtse gsum dang paT+Ti sa/ /ngos la dbyug pa tho ba dang / /rdo rje dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i phreng / /'khor lo dung dang ga dA dang / /ral gri dang ni to ma raM/ /bum pa gang ba dag dang ni/ /mi snang ba yi 'bag sha dang / /pad+ma dang ni ut+pa la/ /rgyal mtshan gdugs dang nor bu

dang / /dbyug pa dang ni rdo rje dang / /gra bzhir rdo rjes mtshan pa yin/ /nor bu rdo rje dag dang ni/ /dgra sta rdo rje dag dang ni/ /phyag rgya bzhi dang dga' ba 'khyil/ /bya ma bum dang kun di dang / /ril ba b+h+r-ing ga ri dang ni/ /e na'i pags pa dang / /mchod phyir

thogs pa'i snam bu dang / /steng du rgyu skar bcas pa yi/ /zla ba nyi ma de bzhin no/ /kun kyang 'bar ba'i nang du 'dug /so sor cha ni dbye bar bya/ /mkhas pas shar gyi sgor bri ba/ /'gying bag mthong na 'jigs su rung / /lag na rdo rje 'jigs pa med/ /rdo rje 'chang ba 'bar

ba'i nang / /ki li ki la gtum po che/ /lho phyogs kyi ni sgo ru gzhag /nub tu rdo rje ping ga la/ /mthong na 'jigs su rung ba yi/ /byang du nges par gnod mdzes bya/ /phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun tu ni/ /pad+ma'i phreng dang ut+pal phreng / /grwa dag dang ni grwa rnams su/ /klu yi

rgyal po bzhi rnams bri/ /sgo srung ba dag bri ba ni/ /nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang / /stobs kyi lha dang lngas rtsen yin/ /sgo yi gnas kyi bar dag tu/ /chu bo bzhi ni bri bya ba/ /gang gA dang ni si ta dang / /pak+Shu dang ni sin+du yin/ /phreng ba'i nang rol thog dag tu/ /

dpal gyi lha mo ba san tI/ /dpe med ma dang sa yi lha/ /lo tog sman gyi lha mo dang / /sgra dbyangs ma dang 'jigs ldan ma/ /de bzhin mi yi lha dag dang / /'phrog ma dang ni dung can ma/ /gtum mo dang ni me tog so/ /de dag bri bar bya ba yin/ /khrus byas 'dri mkhan gtsang

ma yis/ /gtsang ma'i snod du tshon rnams ni/ /lhag ma min pas kun tu bri/ /zas ni dkar gsum grub par bya/ /khyad par 'dod pas zas ngan pa/ /spang bar bya ba nya dang sha/ /btsong dang sgog skya ke'u rnams dang / /'dres pa spang bar bya ba ni/ /log 'dren glags tshol

spang phyir ro/ /khrus byas gos ni sar pa bgos/ /gtsang mas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ /dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ /kun tu brgyan bar bya ba ni/ /ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs mda' dang ni/ /lha rdzas dar ni dpyang ba dang / /ba dan yang

ni dpyang bar bya/ /tshon skud sna lnga'i srad bu yis/ /kun tu yongs su bskor bar bya/ /zangs las byas pa'i pad+ma'i tshad/ /sor bzhi 'dab ma bye ba de/ /mdzes pa grwa bzhir gzugs par bya/ /snying po dkyil 'khor grwa rnams su/ /pad+ma brgyad ni gzhal ba dag /gser

las byas pa bzhi gzhag cing / /de bzhin dngul las byas pa bzhi/ /kun tu byi ru'i phreng ba dang / /mu tig phreng ba de bzhin no/ /kun tu gser gyi srang bu dang / /rin chen sna tshogs gzhag par bya/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor thig bar du/ /gser gyi snod ni

bzhi dag dang / /dngul gyi snod ni bzhi gzhag go/ /dngul gyi bum pa gang ba bzhi la dngul dang / gser dang / zangs las byas pa'i me tog spras pa'i mgo lcogs kyis spras pa gzhag par bya'o/ /gser gyi bum pa bzhi gzhag pa la mu tig dang / byi ru dang / pad+ma

rA ga dang / ma rgad dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / dngul dang / gser dang / me tog gis spras pa'i mgo lcogs gzhag par bya'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga pur dang / gur gum dang / lha rdzas kyi tsan+dan gyi phye mas gser gyi snod bkang ba dang / dngul gyi snod kyi nang du gser

gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi me tog mu tig gis brgyan cing rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs spras pa gzhag par bya/ cod pan gyi rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan bzhi gzhag par bya/ tshon sna tshogs can dang / dar dmar po

dpyang bar bya/ dngul gyi pog por bzhi gzhag ste/ tsan+dan dang / gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / gur gum gyi bdug pas bdug par bya/ sa las byas pa'i bum pa gser gyis g.yogs pa'i nang du dri chab rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang ste/ rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par

bgyis la bkang ba la dar gyis bcings la rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i steng du zangs las byas pa'i me tog bzhag nas snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du pad+ma'i steng du gzhag par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu dri dang / phye ma dang / byug pa dang /

me tog dang / 'bras bu la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mchod yon gyi chab kyis dngul gyi snod dang / zangs kyi snod bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /lcags kyi snod bum pa gang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /me tog dang / mgo lcogs dang /

por phog bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi gzhag par bya'o/ /gzhag par bya ste bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug par bya'o/ /sgo bzhir dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan cing spud pa gzhag par bya'o/ /sna ma'i me tog gi gdu bu'i steng du mda' la ba dan btags pa drug cu rtsa bzhi bcugs

te/ tshon sna tshogs kyis bkra bar byas pa'i mda' dang / nor bu'i phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis dkyil 'khor brgyan par bya'o/ /de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thog thag tu sa dang bsres pa'i ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor byas la dri chab kyis bskus te/ tshon sna lnga'i srad bus

thig btab la sgo bzhi rnam par phye ste/ seng ldeng gi phur bu tshad sor bcu gnyis pa drug cu rtsa bzhi gdab bo/ /tshon sna lnga'i srad bus dkyil 'khor kun du bskor bar bya'o/ /bum bu dang / bum pa dang / byam bum drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang pa gzhag go/ /

khom phor zlum po drug cu rtsa bzhi gtor ma sna tshogs kyis bkang pa gzhag go/ /gtor ma tshul sna tshogs pa drug cu rtsa bzhi so sor gzhag go/ /snod tshon sna lnga pa drug cu rtsa bzhi kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bkang pa dang / bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs blugs pa dang / gtor ma

dkar po rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag go/ /yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba/ ro rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag go/ /'bras bu sna tshogs dang / me tog sna tshogs dgram mo/ /phreng ba brgya nyi shu rtsa gcig dkyil 'khor du dpyang bar bya ste/ byang phyogs kyi dkyil

'khor la drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sum cu rtsa gnyis gdags so/ /me mar gyi sdong bu bzhi bud bar bya'o/ /gtor ma brgya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang dkyil 'khor thog thag tu mar me bud par bya'o/ /chang dang sha dang / beg btsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang / tshod sngon dang / la

phug spangs pa'i gtor ma gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol grwa bzhir don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/ /sgo re rer bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/ /chos klog pa legs par khrus

byas te/ lha rdzas kyi gos kyis dkris te/ gtsang ma la dri rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgos pa'i gos gtsang ma sar pa bgos te/ chos kyi stan shin tu brgyan pa lha rdzas kyi stan la 'dug nas tshig 'jam po tshig mnyen pos bklag par bya'o/ /nub kyi phyogs cha

la dkyil 'khor mthon po la bde ba can gyi bkod pa bris pa 'od dpag med dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob pa'i gzugs bri ba'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag par bya'o/ /shar gyi phyogs cha la dkyil 'khor

grwa bzhi mthon po byas la rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor la shAkya thub pa dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i khro bo'i gzugs bris pa ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ /lho'i phyogs cha la ri 'dra ba'i gnas

mthon po byas la de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang phyug rgyal po dang / 'jam dpal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa ras la bris pa'i dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ /byang gi phyogs cha la khro bo'i rgyal

po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / byams pa dang / sa'i snying po bris pa'i ras kyi sku gzugs dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par gzhag go/ /stegs bu'i rnam par mthon por byas pa thams cad legs par brgyan par bya'o/ /dar gyi phreng bas

brgyan par bya'o/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / bum pa gang ba gzhag pa dang / dris dkyil 'khor bya ba dang / ro'i mchog rnam pa sna tshogs bza' ba'i ngo bo rnam pa du ma'i kha zas kyi ro 'bul ba dang / 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i bsod snyoms

gzhag pa dang / tsan+dan dang / a ga ru dang / du ruska dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi dang / gur gum dang bsres pa'i bdug pa ras kyi sku gzugs la dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas dus gsum du khrus bya zhing / gos lan gsum brjes te/ dus

gsum du bzlas brjod dang cho ga bya'o/ /tshes brgyad nas brtsams te tshes bco lnga tshang gi bar du don yod pa'i zhags pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu nyi shu rtsa gcig

dang / don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i zhags pa'i snying po dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par 'phrul pa lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i

dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /zla ba nya la thug gi bar du zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /tshes bco lnga'i nyin mtshan thog thag tu don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dpag tu med par bzlas brjod bya'o/ /mtshan thog thag bzlas

brjod byas kyang ngal ba med pa dang / lus snyom pa dang bral bas bzlas brjod bya'o/ /byams pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sems su bya'o bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba mtshams bcad pa dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / bdag srung ba dang /

gzhan srung ba dang dkyil 'khor bsdam pa byas nas/ de nas 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du dam tshig la gzhug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi las zin nas mchod pa brtsam mo/ /mchod pa'i cho ga zin pa dang / de nas bzlas brjod brtsam

par bya ste/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod byas la/ khro bo'i rgyal po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /bzlas brjod lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dang / dbang bskur ma thag tu ras kyi sku gzugs

dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu 'bar zhing 'od zer sna tshogs 'byin cing legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i snying dga' zhing lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shin tu 'bar zhing 'od 'phro ba nyi

ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer can don yod pa'i zhags pa tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi nang nas mngon du gshegs te/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor kun la rnam par gzigs shing rig sngags 'chang ba legs so zhes bya ba'i

sgra phyung ste/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste rig sngags 'chang ba'i spyi bo la bzhag ste/ dkyil 'khor gyi mchog shin tu brgyan cing spras pa 'di ni shin tu bzang ba yin te/ legs so legs so/ /'di rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa rnam

par 'phrul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang ba/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /

lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po rnams kyi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bdud thams cad pham par byed pa'i dkyil 'khor bgegs dang / rnam par log 'dren thams cad 'joms pa/ bud med dang / skyes

pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rje'u'i rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i bya'ang rung ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i gcong rong las sgrol ba yin no/ /'di ni sdig pa dang / sgrib

pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / nad dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba las yongs su thar bar byed cing 'jigs pa med pa'i khyim du 'jug par byed pa yin no/ /'di ni rnam par thar par byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po snying po dang / gsang sngags

su bcas pa rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa 'di rig sngags 'chang ba de dang des ming brjod pa dang / gang dran pa tsam la sogs pa dang / lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / ming 'dzin pa yang 'khor ba'i pha rol tu rgal

bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa nyid du sa bcu bgrod nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de gang zhe na/ gang zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba mngon du mthong ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i gzungs 'jig

rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bzlas brjod byed pa dang / klog pa dang / dran pa dang / 'chad pa dang / lan 'ga' smyur bas mthong ba dang / thang cig dang / skad cig dang / yud tsam gyis mthong ba ni nga dang mnyam pa dang / mi mnyam pa yin no zhes smra'o/ /

bdag ni sems can de la de bzhin gshegs pa yin par yang 'dzin te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa yin pas spyi bos dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang bas zung shig dang / mchog ji ltar 'dod pa dang / ji ltar yid la re ba dang / bsam

pa thams cad rjes su gzung zhing sbyin par mdzad do/ /de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang bas yid la ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog smras na/ de thams cad sbyin par mdzad cing don yod pa'i ye shes bkod pa rnam par grol ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan

yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa khrag khrig stong phrag bcu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor de'i dam tshig tu zhugs pa ni dam tshig shes pa'i rjes su zhugs pa yin te/ de dag thams cad sa bcu la

rab tu gnas pa yin/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ba yin/ lung bstan pa dang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba yin/ de ni mngal na gnas par skye ba'i tha ma ste/ phyis mang lan

gnas pa'i dri mas gos par mi 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de pad+mo'i nang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par rdzus te skyes par 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs kun tu tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i rgyal po'i phun sum

tshogs pa cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ dam tshig chen po 'di kha ton byed na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing

na byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar legs so zhes bya ba thob par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu skye ba blangs pa legs par skye ba yin pas legs so legs so/ /phyir mi ldog par bla na med pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas pa yin no/ /de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'od zer 'bum phrag bye bas mdzes par gyur cing bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i phyag gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas spyi bor

phyag 'jog cing dbugs 'byin par yang mdzad do/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du chos 'bel ba'i gtam mngon sum du sgrogs par mdzad do/ /tha na dkyil 'khor chen po rol mo'i sgra rnga bo che dang / rnga bran dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rol mo'i sgra gang dag grag

pa la sems can gang dag gis sgra de thos nas rna ba'i bu ga tsam du song ba de thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tha na byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs par bya'i rna bar sgra thos pa de dag thams cad

kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa rnam par thar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga mthu chen po rnam par 'phrul pa yin no/ /rigs kyi bu po'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen

nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ sems can gzhan gang yang rung ba dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u'i rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ 'ga' zhig gis rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'di 'khor mang po'i nang du klog pa dang

sems can gang gis sgra de thos nas sgra dbyangs de dang ming thos pa rna ba'i bu gar song bar gyur pa de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa mi zad pa las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sras su rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sras kyi thu bo yin no/ /rtag par 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug grogs mdzad cing rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dbugs 'byin pa mdzad

par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du rtag tu rjes su srung bar mdzad do/ /sems can gang zhig dkyil 'khor de'i sa phyogs su song ste/ sa gzhi snang ba tsam mthong ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad

bsregs shing sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i sa rdul rlung gis bdas te lus la phog pa gang yin pa de dang / tha na sems can ngan pa yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig

pa thams cad las yongs su grol ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu mthong ba dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dbugs phyung bar 'gyur ro/ /lha

thams cad kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na sgra thos pa tsam dang / ming 'dzin pa tsam gyis 'bras bu chen po thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rnam par grol

ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad sreg cing sdug bsngal drag po las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa drag po'i rgya mtsho dang / 'khor ba las sgrol ba 'grub pa phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas bla na

med par dbugs 'byin par mdzad pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i lam ston pa/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' ston pa/ lha'i stegs

sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyi mod la the tshom med par me lha dang / dbang po dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / dbang phyug dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu rnams sbyin sreg byas pa 'di tsam gyi mod la thams cad 'ong bar

'gyur ro/ /the tshom med par lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / srin po dang / sha za dang / grul bum thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur zhing / de'i mod la rig sngags 'chang

ba'i rkang pa gnyis la rtag tu 'dud par byed do/ /de bzhin du nyin mtshan du kun tu srung bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid chen po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po chen po bcu yang phyogs bcur srung bar byed de/ mi srun pa ma rungs pa sel cing

dmyal ba dang / 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / dug drag po dang / sems can ma rungs pa rnams sel bar byed do/ /de ma thag tu bsod nams chen po'i lhun po dang / bsod nams chen po'i phung po bla na med pa skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tsan+dan srang nyi shu dang / a ga ru srang lnga dang /

du ru ska srang bdun dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi srang gcig gi bzhi cha re re dang / gur gum srang gcig dang / lce bog kun du ra srang lnga dang / gu gul srang bdun dang 'di rnams gcig tu bsres te/ phye mar byas la khar dkar po dang / sbrang rtsis ril bu zho re'i tshad tsam

du byas pa stong rtsa brgyad dang / yungs kar dang / 'bras yos bsres te/ ril bu dang bsres nas mar gyi nang du smyugs te sbyin sreg bya'o/ /shing srur b+hi dang / shing arka dang / shing sha mya'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar te sbyin sreg gi cho ga bya'o/ /gang dang gang gi tshe stong rtsa

brgyad sbyin sreg byas na de dang de'i tshe sdig pa dang / sgrib pa drag po thams cad sreg par 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe de nad thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe gcod thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /de dang de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems

can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs la sogs pa thams cad kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa thams cad dang / byur thams cad dang /

gnod pa thams cad dang / 'khrug pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa dang / shags 'gyed pa thams cad dang / rang gi 'khor dang / gzhan gyi 'khor gyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i dgras 'jigs pa thams cad

dang / sems can ma rungs pa thams cad dang / rkun po dang / zol ba dang / mi rgod pa dang / gcan gzan gtum po'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can de dag thams cad 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang /

khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag gis de'i dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu gnas par 'gyur

ro/ /tshe brjes nas thams cad bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur zhing / pad+mo'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa rnams kyis de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis thams cad nges par phyir mi ldog

par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de ji lta ji ltar sbyin sreg byed pa de lta de ltar nge'i lus dri ma med cing yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /stong rtsa

brgyad tshang na rig sngags 'chang ba'i lus 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mang po'i sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag gis rig sngags 'chang ba la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin te/ rig sngags 'chang ba

legs so legs so/ /'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchog /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga yin no/ /'di ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni gnod

sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / brjed byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren tshar gcod pa'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni byang chub kyi snying por song ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sbyin sreg chen po'i cho ga yin no/ /'di ni byang chub kyi lam bla na

med pa yin no/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag 'jog par mdzad do/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi rgyan thams cad

kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mdun na bzhugs te bka' stsol pa/ rig sngags 'chang ba khyod kyis

don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga chen po grub pa legs so legs so/ /zung shig dang / mchog ji lta ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas ji ltar

'dod pa'i mchog smras na de thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gis phyag brkyang ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba'i mgo'i spyi bo la phyag bzhag pa dang / phyag bzhag ma thag tu rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /

phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing du de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing la bsnyen bkur byas nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa chos 'chad pa/ byang chub

kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mngon sum du thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ho ma khung bshad par bya ste/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin sreg gi gnas bla na med pa'i pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar byas pa/ zlum po khru gsum pa sa dang ba'i lci ba bsres pa dang ldan par byas te/ pad+ma'i snying

po la ho ma khung za bas su brko ba dang / thab ka kun tu khru gang ba brko bar bya'o/ /nang du pad+ma bcu drug pa 'bur du byas pa bzhag la/ tshon sna tshogs kyis pad+ma de brgyan par bya'o/ /pad+ma'i phyi 'khor du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas la dri sna tshogs kyis gtor ba dang brgyan par bya'o/ /

dkyil 'khor kun tu bum pa gang ba bzhi dang / dngul gyi snod gang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon gyi chus bkang pa gser gyi snod bzhi dang / ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa ni gtor ma dkar gsum rnam pa sna tshogs dang 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag pa dang / dri dang me

tog sna tshogs kyis gtor te/ phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dpyangs la/ dkyil 'khor kun du tshon sna lnga'i ba dan gyis mda' la brgyan te gzugs pa dang / sgo bzhi cha dbye ba dang / bum pa gzhag pa ni legs par brgyan cing dri chus yongs su bkang bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhir chos smra

ba shin tu brgyan pa'i stan la 'dug ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag par bya'o/ /grwa bzhir cho ga smra ba chos kyi stan legs par brgyan pa la 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i mdo sde bklag par bya'o/ /gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi

me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos dri zhim pos bgos te/ gtsang mar byas pa la ril bu la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal

po brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dbang bskur ro/ /don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i snying po brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa rnam par lta ba'i 'bar ba rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zhags pa'i snying pos stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya ba ni mi smra bar byams pa'i sems dang /

snying thag pa nas brtse ba dang / snying rje bar bya ba ni las bla na med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di lta ste/ oM pad+ma

pA Ni/ tsa ra tsa ra pad+ma b+hu dze/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU tA sha ne/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ da ha da ha/ sarba ma lA na/ a mo g+ha pA ni ba ra de/ hUM hUM nir da ha/ pA paM/ sha ma sha ni/ lo kot+tA ra Ni/ sa man+ta raSh+mi ba ra de/ ru tu ru tu/ pra ba re/ a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ oM b+hur+b+hu pa/ na

mo stu te swA hA/ de ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bar ba zhags pa chen po'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi sbyin sreg gi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa bla na med pa yin no/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas thal ba des rmad du byung ba chen po'i bya ba thams cad bya'o/ /thal ba des

gang gi lus la byugs pa de ni sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /dpral bar thig le byas na de ma thag tu zhag bzhi pa'i rims las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /zhag gnyis pa dang / zhag gsum pa dang / mtshan mo pa dang / nyin par pa dang / nam phyed pa dang / nyin

phyed pa dang / lo gcig pa dang / zla ba gcig pa dang / zhag bdun pa dang / rtag pa'i rims lan 'ga' yang gnas shing phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad brgya 'das te 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /mtshog mar thig le byas na gdon stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las thar

bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad kyang phyogs bcur dpag tshad stong du 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /thal ba'i rdul bya rog gi mchu la gos pa phyogs kyi gnas gang du lhung ba der gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / dang / grul bum dang / brjed

byed dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren phyir gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /thams cad 'bros so/ /phyogs kyi gnas der lhung na slar 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /snying gar thig le byas na nad thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas na lto ba'i nang gi nad

thams cad mod la sos par 'gyur ro/ /gdug pas zin pa la bskus na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /dug gis myos pa la byin na dug med par 'gyur ro/ /thal bas khrus byas na byad dang / g.yengs byed dang / sngags dang / dug thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /sha

bkra dang / mdze dang / 'bras dang / shu phran mched pa dang / 'brum bu dang / lhog pa dang / me dbal dang / 'brum phran rnams byung na chu dron po dang sbyar te bskus la mar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bskus na mod la nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur

ro/ /sprin logs su gtor na sad dang / ser ba thams cad mi 'bab bo/ /rlung ldang ba'i logs su gtor na rlung bsdams par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bzhir gtor na mtshams chen po bcad par 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor kun tu gtor na me tog dang / 'bras bu dang / lo tog

dang / me tog gi ljon shing dang / shing gi ya la ga dang / ldum ra dang / kun dkar ra ba dang / ri dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman dang / nags tshal thams cad legs par bsrungs bar 'gyur ro/ /yul 'khor la dpag tshad brgya tshun cad kun tu mtshams chen

po gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir gtor na der 'jug pa dang / phyir 'byung ba'i sems can bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / byol

song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa rkang gnyis pa dang / rkang bzhi pa dang / dang / bya de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /dgongs pa tsam gyis nad dang sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams

cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe yongs su brjes nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas nyid du gnas kyi bar du phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dur khrod dam/ ra bsregs pa'i steng du thal bas gtor na/ dmyal bar skyes

pa'i sems can de dag thams cad mod la dmyal ba nas thar te/ mngon par dga' ba'am/ bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer ram/ gtsug lag khang ngam/ lha'i gnas sam/ grong ngam/ khyim mam/ dgon pa'i gnas sam/ yul 'khor kun tu gtor na

mtshams chen po bcad cing zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor gtor na rgyal po dang btsun mo'i 'khor dgra thams cad las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /skye bo mang po'i nang du gtor na skye bo mang po de dag thams cad sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang

bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang bye ba stong phrag brgya byed pas rang 'dod pa la rang gi blos thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o/ /de nas rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sku gzugs

ras la bri ba bshad par bya'o/ /dar ram ras gtsang ma legs par btags pa tshad khru do'am/ khru gsum mam/ khru bzhi pa de'i dbus su don yod pa'i zhags pa/ 'jig rten dbang phyug /tshangs pa'i cha byad 'chang ba/ dbu lcang lo cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ cod pan

rgyal ba 'od dpag med dang g.yas su zla ba tshes pa can gyis brgyan pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa bri ba ni ri bo po Ta la lcug ma me tog can sna tshogs kyis gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi lcug mas gang ba bya'o/ /de'i

steng du rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ seng ge'i khri bya'o/ /seng ge'i khri'i steng du pad+ma'i gdan bya'o/ /de'i steng du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bzhugs par bya ste/ pad+ma dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang / zhags pa thogs shing gzugs de phyag dbugs

'byin pa bya'o/ /dbu'i gong man tshad gzhal med khang chen po lha rdzas rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ dbus su mtho ba dang bcas pa bya'o/ /dbus mtho ba'i steng du de bzhin gshegs pa bdun tshad dang mthun par pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o/ /

de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gong gi dbus su de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dang / 'od dpag med dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'od dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ skyil mo krung bcas te gzhal med khang gi nang na bzhugs

par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'od 'dom gang la 'khor bar de bzhin gshegs pa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye 'khor kun tu 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs dang / mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba bya'o/ /de nyid kyi nye

'khor du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis bya'o/ /gong gi dbus su rdo rje 'chang ba khro gnyer can rdo rje gsor bar bya'o/ /de nas tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug chen po dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi dbang po dang / 'og min gnas

kyi lha'i bu dang / dga' ldan gyi lha'i bu dang / 'phrul dga'i lha'i bu dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma'i lha'i bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / me lha dang / nag po chen po dang / dga' ba'i dbang phyug dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga'

bo dang / stobs lha dang / gang ba bzang po dang / nor bu bzang po dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che sna tshogs lag pa nas 'phrul pa dang /

mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs par bya// //'phags pa don yod zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po bcu bzhi pa/ lha rnams kyi phyi rol thog thag tu pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje dang / mdung rtse gsum pas spras pa'i pad+ma'i phreng bas kun tu 'khor bar bya/

g.yas phyogs su 'phags ma sgrol ma skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ut+pa la dang / nor bu rin po che phyag na thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhal du blta bar bya'o/ /de'i rgyab bu khro gnyer ma me tog sna

tshogs 'chang ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /g.yon du dkar mo zhes bya ba ni skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ ku mu da dang / nor bu rin po che lag na thogs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /

dkar mo de'i rgyab tu pad+ma mdzes dga' ma me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bya'o/ /lha mo sgrol ma dang / dkar mo'i 'og tu pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i lha mo thams cad kyang dbu yid tsam 'dud pa/ na bza' dkar po gsol ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa bzhengs pa bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su srin mo ral pa gcig ma gtum mo skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ phyag bzhi la zhags pa dang / dgra sta dang / ral gri dang / rdo rje lag na thogs pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /g.yon du pho nya

mo zhal mche ba gtsigs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa phyag bzhi la rdo rje dang / dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa phyag na thogs pa/ skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na 'jig rten dbang phyug la blta bar bya'o/ /ri bo po Ta la'i ngos

kyi gseb tu klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / klu'i bu mo klu'i gnas dang bcas pa bya ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs shing / gong du bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang phyug la 'thor bar bya'o/ /ri'i smad du lha mo dpe med ma dang / lha mo bas na ti dang / sa'i lha mo

dang / dpal lha mo dang / lha mo 'jigs byed ma dang / sgra dbyangs ma dang / lcags sgrog ma dang / dung can ma ste/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ me tog sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che thogs pa bya'o/ /gzhal med khang gi gong du mchod rten chen po brgyad phreng ba

sbrengs la mchod rten gyi rgyan ji lta bar brgyan par bya'o/ /mchod rten gyi 'og g.yas rol du bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la 'jig rten dbang phyug mngon du mchod pa mdzad pa bya'o/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba phyag na rnga yab thogs pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang

srong dang / lha'i bu me tog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su bcom ldan 'das chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bya ste/ kun dga' bo dang / rdo rje 'chang ba lag na rnga yab kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon du g.yob par bya'o/ /g.yas

phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don yod pa'i zhags pa bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yon phyogs su khro bo'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /de'i 'og tu drang srong dang / lha'i tshogs bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa

byed pa bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs kyi g.yon dang g.yas kyi phyi rol thog brag tu de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brgya rtsa brgyad pad+mo'i gdan la tshad ji bzhin du skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi seng ge'i gdan gyi zhabs drung du rig sngags 'chang ba pus mo btsugs te/ me tog dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs te 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mngon du blta bar bya'o/ /ri mo mkhan khrus byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos

te/ gtsang bar byas la ro sna tshogs pa'i zas dkar gsum bza' bar bya'o/ /snod sar pa gtsang ma'i nang nas tshon lhag ma ma yin pas bri bar bya'o/ /'di'ang kha zas mi gtsang ba sna tshogs dang / gos ngan pa mi gtsang ba yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /tshig ngan pa dang / sems

ngan pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /chang dang / sha dang / beg btsong dang / sgog skya dang / ke'u dang 'dres pa yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /nyi ma re re zhing ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya'o/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar bya'o/ /byams

pa dang / snying rje'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la dang ba lhag par bya ste ras kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya'o/ /ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa'i tshon sna tshogs kyis bri bar bya'o/ /dben zhing 'du 'dzi yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /rmugs pa dang / gnyid

yongs su spang bar bya'o/ /de ltar ri mo bri ba ni las legs par byas pa yin no/ /zla ba yar gyi ngo la bri bar bya'o/ /rgyu skar shin tu bkra shis pa dang / tshes grangs dang nyi ma shin tu bkra shis pa la brtsam par bya'o/ /rgyu skar rgyal ni bkra shis pa yin te de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad kyis bsngags pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba yin no/ /rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong

dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la la zhig don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam

par gzigs pa/ byang chub chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ ras kyi sku gzugs chen po mthong ba ni sku gzugs mthong ba tsam gyi mod la sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed

pa dang / mtshams med pa la gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad spong bar byed pa rnams kyang mthong ba tsam la sogs

pas sdig pa thams cad phye mar rlog go/ /rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/ /sdom pa chen po yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ /gang gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub snying po la mngon du gshegs pa dang / chos

kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /ras kyi sku gzugs 'di mthong ba ni gzhal med khang dang bcas pa'i ri bo po Ta lan 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas te mngon du bzhugs pa mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra ste/ 'di la the tshom mi

bya'o/ /yid gnyis bskyed par mi bya'o/ /sems kyis skad cig gcig rab tu dang ba byas na/ bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis dgongs te mchog sbyin

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus dang sems yid las byung ba'i yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral zhing ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /

'jig rten pa thams cad dga' ba dang / bla mar lta bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe ring por 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye bar

'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa'i sku gzugs 'di gang gis mchod pa de ni phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni mngal na gnas pa'i tha ma yin te/ phyis ma rig

pa'i mun pa'i nang du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na mi mnyam pa dang 'dra ba yin te/ ras kyi sku gzugs kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa'i cho ga 'di ni dam pa yin no/ /de nas gsang sngags kyi cho ga 'jig rten las 'das pa sgrub pa brjod par bya'o/ /gang gis dran pa

tsam gyi mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon sum du mthong nas 'dug pa dang / phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon du mthong ba sbyin par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams

cad mngon du bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par mdzad pa dang / dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / snying po dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lus su 'gro ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dus gsum

du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i tshogs mchog thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad dang / rig pa'i rgyal po la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha a ba lo ki te ma hA maN+Dal pad+ma sarba bo d+hi sa twa na ma skr-i te/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba lo ki te/ a mo g+ha ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka bo d+ha ya/ bo d+ha ya/ ma hA bo d+ha ni/ bo d+hi bo d+hi/ pad+ma bi bo d+ha ni/ sarba pA pa an d+ha kA ra/

pra sha ma ni/ sarba durga ti/ b+ha ra ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ba hu bi bi d+ha/ be Sha d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta gar+b+he/ hu ru hu ru/ a mo g+ha gar+b+he/ tu ru tu ru/ a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste/ mu ru mu ru/ bi mo k+Sha b+hu dze/ k+Shi Ni k+Shi Ni/ sarba A ba ra Na bi shud d+he/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta/

pa ri pU ra Ni/ ta ra ta ra/ tA ra ya mA na/ a ba lo kA ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ ma Ni ka na ka /bi b+hu Shi ta/ bA hu/ da ma da ma/ dur dA na tA nA na/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra da/ ma hA kA ra Ni ka /sarba de ba ga Na na ma skr-i ta/ r-i Shi ga Na/ sta bi ta/ sha ta sa ha sra tsan+t+ra sUr+ya/ a hi re ka /

ra sh+mi/ a ba b+hA si ta/ ma hA pa shu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ pa ra ma/ shud d+ha satwa/ a ba lo ki te/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pa ra ma/ kU ru Ni ka /maN+Da le shwar/ su pra bud d+ha/ ma hA pad+ma/ b+hu dze shwa ra/ ma hA bid+yA d+ha re shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ma hA bi mo k+Sha/

maN+Da la d+ha ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta gu h+ya/ mu drA sa ma ya d+ha ra/ ma hA ba la bid+yA d+ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ mau khi d+ha ra/ a mi tA b+ha/ mu ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki ta/ lo ke shwa ra/ ma he shwa ra/ pA sha d+ha re shwa ra/ pa ra pa ra/ pa ra ma/ ma hA mai tri/ a ba lo ki te/

sarba satwa/ san+ta rA ga /sid d+hi/ si d+hA shA/ pa ri pU ra ka /ma hA ba ra/ pra mo da/ na mo stu te swA hA/ 'di ni thams cad rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ 'phags pa spyan

ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i mchog /gsang ba sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad yongs su sbyong ba/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs 'jug pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dus

gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bI ra bI ra/ ma hA maN+Dal/ bi shwa rU pa Sha Ta pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ka /sarba bo d+hi sa twa/ na ma skr-i ta/ ba ra ma bi pu la/ bi mo k+Sha d+ha ra/ ma hA pA sha /bi lo ki ha/ a mo g+ha

pA sha dz+wa li ta ma hA dz+wa la a ba lo ki tA/ ma hA ma Ni biSh+Ta d+ha ra/ sa man+ta a ba b+hA si ta/ dz+wa la dz+wa la/ ma hA gam b+hI ra/ bi mo k+Sha pA sha d+ha ra/ ba la bo d+h+yang ga /A kar+Sha ka /oM prah+ma rU pa/ ma hA a mo g+ha pra sha hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ sarba sa twa/ bi lo ki ta/ ba ra pra da/ na mo stu te

swA hA/ 'di ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'o/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs

rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM bi bud d+h+ya/ bi bud d+h+ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /ta ra ta ra tA ra ya/ ma hA arna ba pa ra na/ ma hA b+hu dza bi lo kA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ nye ba'i snying po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen

po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha /ma hA dA na pA ra mi tA/ pa ri pU ra ya/ hUM da ra da ra/ bi bid+ha/ bi tsi tre/ sarba sa twa u pa b+ho ga /sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA dA na/ pU dzA me g+ha/ pra brta ya/ ta ra ta ra/

tA ra ya/ ma hA pad+ma pA Ni hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i zhags pa chen po'i snying po ste/ gang gis yungs 'bru tsam yang sbyin pa byin te dran pa tsam gyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas na mchod sbyin sbyin pa rnam par 'phrul pa chen po shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha shI la/ saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ ma

hA shud d+ha satwa/ pad+ma bi b+hU Shi ta b+hu dza d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba lo ki te/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di smyung ba byas te/ gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad bzung nas mi smra bar lan nyi shu rtsa gcig dran par bya'o/ /de nas don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /bzlas brjod

byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po'i dri mang po lus las 'byung zhing phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags par 'gyur ro/ /gang zhig nyi ma re

re zhing gzungs 'di dran na de ni rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dge slong gang la la zhig tshul khrims zhig cing nyams pas smyung ba byas te/ 'di bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyi mod la tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyu ro/ /tshul khrims mang po dang ldan par

'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM ma hA bIr+ya/ a mo g+ha bi lo ki te/ ba ra ba ra/ d+hi D+ha/ bIr+ya/ ma hA ba la/

ba la ba la/ ma hA bo d+h+yang+ga/ ba la bo d+ha ni/ hUM phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dus rtag tu yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis dran par byas na dran pa tsam gyi mod la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du nam yang brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha k+ShA na ti/ sarba bo d+hi sa twa k+Sha mi Na/ k+Sha Na

k+Sha Na/ ma hA mai tri/ kA ru Na/ sarba satwa/ bta sa la/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /sarba sa twa k+Sha mi Na/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di sems can du gyur pa thams cad la bzod pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / brtse ba'i sems kyis dmyal ba na gnas pa dang / byol song gi skye gnas su

gtogs pa dang / bya gang dag 'das pa gang yin pa dang / gnas pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa de rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir gang zhig gzungs kyi mchog dran par byed na/ dmyal ba'i sems can las thar bar 'gyur zhing skye bo mang po gnas pa gang yin pa

rnams grol bar 'gyur ro/ /nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas kyi bar du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug

thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM sarba tA thA ga ta/ ma hA a mo g+ha/ kA ru NA/ d+h+yAn sa mA d+hi/ sarba bi mo k+Sha/ a pra kam pya ka /tsu ru tsu ru hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la dmigs nas yid rtse gcig tu byas te dran par byas na/

dran pa tsam gyi mod la des bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin stong phrag brgya so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bzhugs par 'gyur ro/ /bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang sgyur bar 'gyur

ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a mo g+ha/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ a ba b+hA sa/ s+pha ra Na/ bud d+hi/ pra sa ra pra sa

ra/ sa man+ta bud d+hi/ a ba lo ki ta/ b+ha ga bA na pra dz+nyA/ a ba lo ki ta/ tsak+Shu She ma hA pradz+nyA/ ba ra dA/ pA Ni/ ma hA pradz+nyA/ pad+ma d+ha ri Na/ b+hu dze hU~M phaT swA hA/ gzungs 'di dran pa tsam gyi mod la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /thabs dang shes rab

sna tshogs kyi dge ba chen po'i blo 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i shes

rab dang blor 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub la thug gi bar du rab tu rmongs par mi

'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi gzungs chen po yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha bi

mo k+Sha/ maN+Dal ma hA da b+hU ta bi ma le/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ ma hA da b+hu ta/ a mi tA b+ha/ ma ku Ta/ d+ha ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ dkyil 'khor der yungs kar dang / dri chab dang ldan pa'i bum pa la sngags bzlas brjod byas nas/ chus kun tu chag chag btab na chag chag btab pa tsam gyi

mod la dkyil 'khor kun tu dpag tshad gcig gi nang dus sbyangs te yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar shel gong dang / rin po che sna tshogs pa dag pa dri ma med pa mdzes pa de 'dra ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/ /shin tu dag pa dang / shin tu dri ma med pa dang / shin tu nyams dga'

pa dang / shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir 'gyur ro/ /shin tu sa gzhi spa bar 'gyur ro/ /sa phyogs de'i bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs gang dag 'khod pa de dag

thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/ /shi nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par

rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'i bar du bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po sogs par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i dang / bya de dag phyogs der 'gro zhing rab tu 'jug pa de dag thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /

bde 'gro'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /gang gis de'i sa lag par 'ongs te reg pa de dag thams cad nad dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rims dang bral ba dang / sgrib pa med pa dang / sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag phyis lus

la tshor ba'i nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bde bas tshim pa'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /sa yongs su sbyong ba'i rig sngags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen

po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha dru ma/ la ta br-i k+Sha/ sha kha pa tra puSh+pa pha la/ ba Ti pa A ro ha na hi DA ga /push+ka ri Na/ u ta sa hr-i da/ sun da ra pra sra ba Ni/ bi bi d+ha/ bi tsi tra/ pa ri sho d+ha ya/ pad+ma b+hu dze/ sa ma sa ma/ sa man+te na/ pa ri maN+Dal/ pa ri sho d+ha

ya/ ma la ma la/ bi ma la bi ma la/ ni rma la su pa ri shud d+ha/ pad+ma ut+pa li b+ha dza la ma lA na bi shud d+ha/ sho d+ha ya sho d+ha ya/ pa ra ma ma hA shud d+hA ya sa twA hU~M phaT/ na mo tri b+hu ba ne hU~M phaT swA hA/ 'dis tsan+dan dang / pad+ma dang / chu dang yungs kar la yongs su bzlas te/ ljon pa'i

sdong po dang / me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / sna tshogs pa'i lcug ma dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang / chu klung dang / mtsho bran dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing bu dang / 'bab chu mdzes pa'i steng du gtor bar bya ste/ de rnams thams cad la

bdud rtsi blug par 'gyur ro/ /de rnams thams cad la lha rdzas kyi me tog dang 'bras bur 'gyur ro/ /tha na lha'i rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags kyi bdag por 'gyur ro/ /gang la reg pa tsam gyis reg pa de thams cad ser sna'i dri ma dang bral zhing / phrag dog spangs

par 'gyur ro/ /mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang / mchil ma dang bral zhing / lus kyi phyi dang nang gi dri mi zhim pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /gang yang lus kyi nang gi nad dang / gnod pa sna tshogs pa de thams cad yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing / rnam par dag pa dang /

rnam par nyams pa dang / legs par yongs su dag pa dang / dri ma med par 'gyur ro zhes so/ /de la chus khrus byas pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang lha'i chu dang / byang chub kyi yan lag gi chus khrus byas par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang sgrib pa'i dri ma thams cad bkrus par 'gyur ro/ /

yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus bkrus par 'gyur ro/ /des so shing zos pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rjes su dran pa chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /mya ngan thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing zhags pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa dang / rtag tu kha

nas ut+pa la'i dri bro bar 'gyur ro/ /ngag 'jam zhing snyan par yang 'gyur zhing ngag mnyen par yang 'gyur ro/ /dga' ba'i gtam byed par 'gyur zhing / skye bo thams cad yid dga' bar yang 'gyur ro/ /mi'am ci'i dbyangs su yang 'gyur ro/ /bstan bcos dang / cho ga

zhib mo dang / gsang sngags dang / theg pa chen po thams cad thos pa tsam gyis kun tu 'dzin par byed cing kha ton du yang gnas par byed do/ /me tog de la mnams pa dang / phreng ba mgul par 'ching bar byed pa gang yin pa de rnams kyang byang chub yan lag gi me tog gi phreng ba bcings

par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang gis mngon par dbang bskur bar yang 'gyur ro/ /sna tshogs su dag par yang 'gyur te/ lha'i dri dang / reg pa dang / yang dag par ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang mtshungs par yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /

lha'i so dang mtshungs pa'i kha dog tu 'gyur/ bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo gang la gtam smras pa de rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ro/ /shi 'phos shing skye ba brjes nas bde ba can gyis 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur te/ pad+ma las rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe

rabs dran par yang 'gyur ro zhes pa'o/ /'bras bu dang / me tog dang / chu dang / nags kyi bdag po dang / rtswa dang / shing gel pa dang / sman yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags so/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ oM a mo g+ha a ma le tri ma le/ bi ma le/ ni rma le/ di bya pa ri shud+d+he sar+b+ba ma lo pa kar+Shi te/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa ba ra de pra ba ra pa ri shud+d+he/ ma hA ma Ni rat+ta kA ya pa ri shud+d+he ma Ni ma Ni sho d+ha ni ma hA

a mo g+ha tsin+tA ma Ni shud+d+he/ hr-i da ya shud+d+he/ kA ya ni rma la ma hA ma Ni pa ri shud+d+he/ hu ru hu ru pra ba ra pA Ni ma hA b+hu dza ba ra de/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA sa twa ba ta sa le pa ri sho d+ha ya mAM sarba pA su bi shud+d+ha ma le swA hA/ rig sngags 'dis rig sngags 'chang gi bdag nyid kyi lus yongs

su sbyang bar bya ste/ tsan+dan gyi chu dang / gur gum pa dang / gla rtsi'i chu dang / ga pur gyi chu dang / yungs kar dang ba byung lnga bsres pas/ rdza gsar pa'i bum pa bkang ste rig sngags 'di stong rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o/ /ras dkar pos bkru bar bya zhing lan bdun du btung bar bya'o/ /

khrus byas pa tsam gyi mod la khro bo'i rgyal pos bdag nyid dbang bkur bar bya'o/ /khrus byas pa tsam dang / dbang bskur ba tsam gyis bdag rang gi phyi nang yongs su dag cing dri ma med par 'gyur ro/ /sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nyon mongs

pa dang nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rga ba la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa thams

cad yongs su spangs par 'gyur zhing bar chad bya ba'i phyir rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du slar 'ong nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bde bar sgrub pa dang / bde bar nyal ba dang / bde bar sad pa dang / nam 'tsho'i bar du bde bar gnas pa dang / dri ma thams cad spang ba dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong ste shi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/ /bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/ /pad+mo'i nang

nas rdzus te skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / lus mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang / tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro/ /mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs

rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo 'di mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton byed par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa'i mdo sde gzhung sna tshogs rnam pa du ma kha ton byed par

'gyur ro/ /bskal pa stong phrag brgya tshun chad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma/ bi ma le/ pra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ mu khe swA hA/ dkyil 'khor char phye ste thig gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+hi/ rU pa bi tsi tra/ gan d+ha ra san d+ha ra/ pra ba ra/ b+hu dze sA hA/

tshon rtsi'i sngags dang / sku gzugs gzhag pa dang / mtshon cha'i rtags bri ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta pa ri maN+Da la/ bA sha ban+d+he hU~M/ yungs kar la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas dkyil 'khor bsdam par bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha/ sa man+ta/ da sha dig ma hA sI

man/ ban d+ha ya/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ hU~M phaT swA hA/ yungs kar dang chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas mtshams gcad pa'o/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha Na/ pA sha ha ste/ b+hu ru b+hu ru swA hA/ yungs kar dang dri chab la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pas bdag bsrung ba'o/ /oM a mo g+ha

tsU Da ma Ni/ hU ru hU ru/ nA ga bA sha ba na d+he hU~M swA hA/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas spyi gtsug bcing ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha rak+Sha/ sa man+te na/ ma hA pA she /d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ slob ma dang grogs rnams bsrung ba ste yungs kar dang / thal ba la lan nyi

shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas te bsrung bar bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha/ dza la bi ma le/ su ru su ru swA hA/ dri chu la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas khrus bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha a mr-i ta bin du tsa ra tsa ra swA hA/ nye reg bya ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha di pya ba s+t+re tsu

ru tsu ru swA hA/ gos kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha b+hu dza ka /ka ba tsa/ ba ra de/ tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/ go cha'i sngags yin te yungs kar dang gur gum gyi chus bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha brah+ma b+hu dza pA r+ya na te na pra sa ra swA hA/ mchod phyir thogs kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsU DA ma Ni pad+me/ a

b+hi Shiny+tsa ya/ ma ma sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka ma Ni ma Ni swA hA/ dbang bskur ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pad+ma ba sun d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra Ni/ hU~M/ stan gyi gsang sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta par+ya nga ke /b+hu bi swA hA/ skyil mo krung bca' ba'i sngags so/ /

oM a mo g+ha su ra d+hi/ pad+ma pa ra pa ra hU~M/ me tog gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha/ gan+d+ha/ pra sa re/ pU r+Na b+hu dze swA hA/ dri'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha bi bi d+ha le pa na pra ba re pi ri pi ri swA hA/ byug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ga gan s+phar Na/ ma yai b+hu ru b+hu ru hU~M/

bdug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha shu kla sa ra sa ra sa a gra d+ha ra bi d+ha ra hU~M/ gtor ma'i sngags te thams cad du bya'o/ /oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra/ nu pi lo ki ni/ ki ri ki ri hU~M/ zas dang gtor ma'i sngags so/ oM bi bi d+ha/ a mo g+ha/ pha la/ pa ra pa ra hU~M/ 'bras bu'i sngags

so/ /oM a mo g+ha a da b+hu ta g+ha na d+ha ba re hU~M/ mchod yon gyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi d+ha/ ma Ni/ b+hU Sha Na/ ba re/ dz+wa la dz+wa la hU~M/ rgyan dang / thod dang / dar dpyang ba dang / mda' dang / tshon sna lnga dang / thig skud kyi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha/ bi bi b+ha/ b+hA dza ni/ dza ya dza ya

swA hA/ snod kyi sngags te thams cad du sbyar ro/ /oM a mo g+ha pra ba ra b+ha ba na b+hu be tha ra tha ra swA hA/ gzhug pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha na ma ska ra Na/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM dza le hU~M/ phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyar ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsakre du ru du ru pra du ru swA hA/ bskor

ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa man+ta b+ha ba ne b+ha ba b+ha ba swA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha tsin+ta ma Ni a kaR+Sha ya du ru du ru swA hA/ gsol ba gdab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ni rman+t+ra Na bi mo k+Sha maN+Da le mi li mi li swA hA/ snyan gsan dbab pa'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha ma hA rash+mi dz+wa

la sa ha sra dz+wa la dz+wa la sa man+ti swA hA/ ma ra me'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ha ste pra sa ra gats+tsha sba b+hA ba naM bi sa rdzi to si sa ra sa ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ slar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha pA sha ba na d+ha sa man+ta ma hA sa ma ya dr-i D+he hU~M phaT swA hA/ dam tshig gi sngags so/ /oM a mo g+ha sa

man+te/ pra ba ra/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra ma hA da b+hu te shwa ra/ d+hi ri d+hi ri hU~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ gsang sngags 'dis la du dang / mo da ka ra dang / zan dang / rtsa ba dang / sdong bu dang / gtor ma dkar po dang / tshogs chen po'i bdag po'i gtor ma sbyin pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa'i sbyin pa

byas na phyis bgegs byed nus par mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi/ /phyag rgya de nas brjod bya ste/ /gang gis gzung ba tsam gyis ni/ /sdig pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur/ /las dang nyon mongs sgrib pa dang / /dug rnams thams cad rnam par bcom/ rnam grol

dkyil 'khor rigs kyi ni/ /dam tshig phyag rgya yang dag yin/ /lag gnyis pad+ma 'drar byas la/ /sor mo rnams ni mnyam gzhag ste/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra bar bya/ /lag gnyis mnyam par gzhag pa yi/ /phyag rgya rnam grol dam tshig 'di/ /don yod zhags par byin gyis

brlabs/ /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par gyi/ /lam gyi 'bras bu thob par byed/ /oM pad+ma b+hu dze pad+ma bi ma le swA hA/ dam tshig rtse mo'i rtse shes pas/ /rdo rje pad+ma rtag tu bya/ /gung mo cung zad bskums nas ni/ /lag gnyis pad+mo 'dra bar bya/ /gang gis phyag rgya 'di mthong ba/ /'jig rten

rnams kyi dbang phyug dag /mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam grol phyag rgyas dogs med par/ /sangs rgyas mtshungs med 'gyur ba yin/ /byang chub sems dpa' kun gyis ni/ /phyag byas pa yi phyag rgya 'di/ /rnam grol dkyil 'khor rmad du byung / /oM pad+me sung pad+me

bi mo k+Sha maN+Da la/ pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ rdo rje bcing ba mnyam gzhag ste/ /rdo rje pad+mo gung mo ni/ /bskums na de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/ /rnam grol gsung ba'i phyag rgya 'di/ /yang dag grol bar rab tu bstan/ /phyag rgya 'di ni bstan pas ni/ /ngan par byas pa thams cad 'jig /

oM a mo g+ha badzra pad+ma b+hu dze mi li mi li swA hA/ lag gnyis thal mo khong stong las/ /mdor na nor bu 'dra bar bcing / /nor bu'i phyag rgya rdo rje 'dra/ /yid bzhin nor bur brjod pa yin/ /las ni don yod thams cad byed/ /don yod mchod pa'i char 'bebs shing / /don yod pha

rol phyin drug rdzogs/ /don yod sangs rgyas rnams dang ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba yin/ /don yod rnam grol dkyil 'khor gsang / /mtshams med lnga po sbyong bar mdzad/ /oM a mo g+ha ma Ni ma Ni/ ma hA ma Ni pad+ma ma Ni swA hA/ rdo rje pad+ma'i thal mo sbyar/ /pad+ma kha bye

'dra bar rgyas/ /gung mo lcags kyu 'dra ba yi/ /phyag rgya 'di ni mchog tu bzang / /phyag rgya 'di ni mthong tsam gyis/ /'bras bu chen po rmad du byung / /'jig rten 'das pa khyad par 'phags/ /dus gsum sangs rgyas mthong ba yin/ /oM a mo g+ha/ badzre ma hA pad+me/ dza le su dza le la

ma hA dza le swA hA/ snying gar rdo rje pad+ma nyid/ /rdo rje bcing ba phun sum tshogs/ /mdzub mo lcags kyu 'dra ba ni/ /bcing bar bya ba phyag rgya 'di/ /gzi brjid chen po dag dang ni/ /stobs chen pha rol gnon pa dang / /thams cad grub par byed pa'i gnas/ /thams cad grub par rab tu

sbyin/ /'jig rten 'das pa grub pa che/ /sangs rgyas nyid phyir bla na med/ /sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa grub/ /gsang sngags grub pa bla na med/ /oM a mo g+ha sid d+hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi/ a ba lo kA ya sid d+hi/ /ma hA bi bu la sid d+hi/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ rdo rje thal

mo mnyam bzhag ste/ /gung mo gshibs te bsgreng ba dang / /srin lag mthe bo so sor 'gyed/ /gung mo yid tsam dgug phya ba/ /pad+ma'i dbang phyug sems dpa' che/ /'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma ste/ /rtag tu rnam grol dkyil 'khor ni/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ /

phyag rgya byas pa 'di yin no/ /phyag rgya 'di dang don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya de dag mthong ba ni 'jig rten dbang phyug mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin no/ /phyag rgya mchog 'di mthong ba ni rnam par grol ba'i dkyil 'khor mthong ba dang 'dra ba yin te/ phyir mi ldog

pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya 'di bcings pa tsam mthong ba'i mod la dam tshig thams cad shes par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba dang gzung ba tsam gyi mod la 'bras bu chen po 'thob cing mod la sangs rgyas dang byang chub bla na med pa yin no/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /oM a ba lo ki ta ma hA shud d+ha sa twa sa ra sa ra/ sa man+ta/ a ba b+hA sa/ kuN+Da la/ d+ha la/ a mi tA b+ha/ ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ dza Ta ma ku Ta/ na ba badzren+d+ra/ maN+Di ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/

sam+b+ha ra/ b+hu ba ne shwa ra pad+ma b+hu dze swA hA/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i byang chub snying po'i lam gyi 'bras bu ston pa/ rtag tu 'jig rten dbang phyug bla ma/ 'jig rten mgon po'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin no/ /phyag rgya bdun ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag bdun

gyis yongs su bskor ba yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de gang du bcings shing phyag rgya mchog gzung ba ni phyag rgya chen po bye ba phrag brgya bcings bar 'gyur ro/ /gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro/ /bstod par 'gyur ro/ /

ming 'dzin pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /phyag rgya bdun po de dag ni gsang sngags sgrub pa thams cad dang / kun du las thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /las thams cad byed pa'i phyag rgya 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam bla na med pa yin no/ /gang zhig phyag rgya de dag bcings pa mthong zhing khrus

legs par byas te/ gtsang mas sgrub par byed pa 'di ni ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi sgrib pas dmyal ba mthong bar mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyi mod la yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bdun gyi drung du dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par

'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po chen po kun du gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sa bcu la rab tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas rab tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba

dang / 'phags pa la skur ba 'debs pa dang / mnar med pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ji ste phyag rgya gzung ba tsam dang / bstan pa tsam gyi mod la sdig pa de dag thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur

ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa rnams las legs par bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan dang / gzhon nu rnams rtag tu

rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rgyun du rjes su 'brang ba byed par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad dga' ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchod rten du gyur pa yin par 'dod pa dang / lus ring bsrel gyi snying po yin par 'gyur ro/ /rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i

lus su 'gyur ro/ /dug gis mi tshugs/ mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ dbyig dug gi 'jigs pas ma yin/ seng ges ma yin/ gcan gzan gtum pos ma yin/ dug mi bzad pas ma yin/ rkun po dang / mi rgod kyis ma yin/ khyim rdib pas

ma yin/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i gdon yang 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad 'jug par mi 'gyur/ lus la dug sbyar ma dang / byad dang sbod gtong gi 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sdig pa can gyi rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu

de bzhin gshegs pa lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems lta ba mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ste/ rtag tu mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par 'dis mthong bar dgyes par

'gyur ro/ /rtag tu yon tan dang bsod nams 'bar ro/ /dpal gyis lus la shin tu 'bar ba'i lus su 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du 'di mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur te/ rgyal po dang / blon po dang / bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / btsun mo'i 'khor gyis mchod par 'os pa

chen por 'gyur ro/ /lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar du yang dgyes par 'gyur te/ mchod par byed do/ /lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin lha'i bdag po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon

nu dang / drang srong gi tshogs rnams kyis mchod par 'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyang rtag tu de mthong bar 'dod par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu dgyes par ston pa bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang bas khrus byas gos gtsang ma bgos te gtsang mar byas la

dri sna tshogs kyis lus bsku ba dang / bdug pa sna tshogs kyis bdug pa byas la/ tsan+dan dkar po dang / gur gum gyis lag pa gnyis bskus te/ ga pur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa'i sa phyogs gtsang mar ras kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi spyan snga'am/ /

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas phyag rgya 'di bcing bar bya'o/ /mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi drung du phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o/ /sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i tshogs yon chab la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o/ /byams

pa dang snying rje'i sems su bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la lhag par brtse ba dang / snying rje'i sems bsgom par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad la bu gcig pa dang 'dra bar shes par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug yid la dran par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas yid la byed

pa dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ phyag rgya chen po bdun po de dag bcing ba byas na phyag rgya bye ba phrag bdun bcings par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mthu brjod par bya'o/ /mthu ni 'jig rten las 'das pa yang dag par mthong ba dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rang bzhin gyi

sku mngon du mthong ba yin no/ /rgyal po'am/ btsun mo'i nang du'am/ skye bo mang po'i nang du tshogs pa dang / dge slong gi tshogs kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du'am/ 'khor du bcad pa'i nang du'am/ rig byed bzhi tshogs pa dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang /

bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang bcas pa de dag gi nang du de dag don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho 'phrul 'jig rten las 'das pa mod la mngon du mthong ba dang / 'das pa'am/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'chi ba

dang / skye ba dang / skyes nas yang dag par dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i 'bras bu dang / dge ba dang mi dge bas shi ba dang / skyes nas phyug po'am/ dbul po'am/ rgyal po thob pa'am/ lha'i longs spyod dang / lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /

khyab 'jug dang / rtag tu dbang phyug chen por 'gyur ba dang / klu'i skye gnas dang / dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po gsang ba pa rnams kyis dmyal ba mi bzad par skye ba dang / mtshams med pa la thug gi bar du mthong ba dang / bram ze'i rigs sam/ rgyal rigs sam

gzhan yang rigs du ma sna tshogs par skye bar mthong ba dag 'jig rten mgon po'i mthus mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub par bya ba de dag thams cad bstan par bya ste/ rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / bde ba dang / lo legs pa dang / mi ngas

dang / yams kyi nad dang / pha rol gyi 'khor ram/ rang gi 'khor la gnod pa dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul sprod pa dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / nad 'byung ba dang / nad med pa dang / char 'bab pa dang / shin tu char 'bab
