pa thams cad dang / dmyal ba dang / dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du ngan song gi 'gro ba las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /gang yang gling bzhi ba'i dang / dmyal ba de dag la yang snang ba des snang bar gyur pas nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba rnams

kyi gtub pa med par gyur te/ sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par skyes te/ lus yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gang yang mnar med pa'i dmyal ba chen po bcu drug po de dag kyang 'od zer gyi snang ba des reg pas dmyal ba de dag thams

cad du pad+ma'i mtsho byung bar gyur cing / sems can de dag kyang yongs su thar nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skal ba mnyam par pad+ma las rdzus te skyes so/ /grang ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang dro zhing bde ba dang / reg na bde bar gyur to/ /

tsha ba'i dmyal ba gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil bar gyur cing / reg na bde ba dang / rab tu dga' bar gyur to/ /gang yang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba dang / bya dang / tha na sbrang bu dang / sha sbrang dag kyang 'od zer des reg pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag thams cad dga' ldan

du lha rnams kyi nang du skyes so/ /sems can gang dag bcings par gyur pa de dag kyang 'od zer des reg pas sems can bcings pa las yongs su grol bar gyur to/ /su mi 'dod pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / lcags kyu lu gu rgyud kyis bcing ba de dag kyang du ma bur gyur to/ /gang snod ma yin

pa de yang 'od zer des phog pas mthong ba yongs su dag pa 'thob bo/ /gang sha bkra dang mdze'i nad kyis lag pa dang / rkang pa dang / rna ba dang / sna mchang ba yang 'od zer des phog pas lus yongs su rdzogs pa dang / lus yongs su dag par gyur to/ /gang 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa

dang / me tog gi shing ljon ba'i shing ljon pa yongs su skams par gyur pa yang 'od zer des reg pas me tog dang / 'dab ma dang / 'bras bu byung bar gyur to/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa gang du 'od zer bab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gtogs pa de na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing so

so'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu snyed bzhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang dang / seng ge'i

khri dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang byung bar gyur to/ /nam mkha'i dkyil gang du 'od zer gyi snang bas reg pa'i nam mkha'i dkyil der yang phyogs bcur kun du rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi/ sprin brtsegs pas khebs par gyur te lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyi char rab

tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang / cod pan dang / dpung rgyan dang / gdu bu dang / do shal dang / se mo do dang / rna rgyan dang / gser gyi skud pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /tshon kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos rmad du byung ba sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab

bo/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi byug pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /lha rdzas kyi bdug pa sna tshogs dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po'i char rab tu 'bab bo/ /tshon kha dog sna tshogs pa'i lha rdzas kyi gos dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab bo/ /

lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / pa ri sha ka dang / tsam pa ka dang / a ti mug ta ka dang / a sho ka dang / skya snar dang / ka dam pa dang / man dA ra ba dang / man dA ra ba chen po'i me tog gi char rab tu babs te/ phyogs

bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i las byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yang rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa yang dag par gnas par gyur te/ gru bzhi pa ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi dang ldan pa shin tu 'bar ba/ lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs lan kan

gyis yongs su bskor cing mu tig gi dra ba sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa gser gyi dril bu sna tshogs phyag 'phyang ba gos sna tshogs kyi phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/ chu shing gi rgyal mtshan sna tshogs bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs bkram pa/ grwar lha rdzas kyi rnga yab sna tshogs kyis mdzes par

byas pa/ go skabs rgya che ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'byung zhing snang ngo / /nam mkha'i dkyil na yang lha rnams lha rdzas rnams kyi me tog dang / bdug spos dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan

dang / rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed cing 'khod de/ de ltar don yod pa'i cho 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i byin gyis rlabs rmad du byung ba chen po'i chen po rab tu bstan cing ya mtshan rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul

pa chen po'i chen por bstan to/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul 'di bstan nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa chen pos rang gi stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de

logs su song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du bltas nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom

ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba/ gsang sngags kyi snying po gsang ba rig

sngags kyi rgyal po chen po bdag gi snying po gsang ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu dang / don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod par 'dren pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po gsum mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bcom

ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du yongs su bsgrags par bgyi'o/ /gang gi dran pa tsam gyis don yod pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i phyag rgya dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gsang sngags dang cho ga rim par phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par mngon du gnas par 'gyur te thams cad so so

nyid du gnas so/ /gsang sngags 'dis gzir bas thams cad mdun du gnas so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so/ /zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po khyod

kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rig sngags kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu smras pa legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi don dang / sems can thams cad kyi don chen po'i phyir sems can thams cad dag pa chen po khyod kyis de'i dus la bab par shes na

da smros shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bskul bar rig nas bzhin 'dzum zhing mig mi 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su mngon du phyogs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan

sngar 'khor mang po'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i lcags kyu don yod pa'i zhags pa 'di smras so/ /dus gsum du gshegs shing so so na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'phags pa

rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi dbang po chen po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi lha thams cad dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rang sangs rgyas dang / 'phags pa

nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa byams pa la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag

med bde ba can na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dkyil 'khor gsang ba dang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba cho ga

zhib mo dang bcas pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sku sems can thams

cad la byams pa kun nas don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rig sngags kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdang ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sems dpa' chen po mchog sbyin lcags kyu la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/

oM A kar+Sha ya/ pad+ma hasta/ ma hA a mo g+ha aM ku shi/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ sany+tsa ra/ sa man+ten/ ma hA pA sha/ aM ku sha/ b+hu dza ba ra da b+hu dza aM ku sha pA sha d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ sa man+ta mu drA/ man+t+ra maN+Da la/ pa Ta la d+ha ra aM ku sha /pA she na/ d+hA ra ya hU~M hU~M/ ma hA brah+ma/ be Sha d+ha ra/ a mo

g+ta rU pa/ aM ku sha d+ha ra/ ta ra ta ra/ ta ta ra/ sa na tA ra ya/ ma hA mu drA/ maN+Da la/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha ba ra da/ ma hA kA ru Ni ka /tri lo tsa na/ bshu pa ti/ be Sha d+ha ra/ I shwa ra/ ma he shwe ra/ pa ra ma kA ru Ne ka /ma ha d+hu te shwa ra ya ma ba ru Na/ na ma skr-i ta/ ku mA ra/ trai lo kya ba

rad/ dam ka /sha ma ka /shA sa ka /rak+Sha ka /ma hA bid+yA/ a mo g+ha/ maN+Da la/ pU dzi ta/ rat+na ma ku Ta/ mA la d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA aM ku sha ak+Sha d+ha ra hU~M hU~M/ b+ha ra b+ha ra/ sam+b+ha ra sam+b+ha ra/ sa man+t+wa mu drA maN+Da laM bU ra ya hU~M hU~M/ hri da ya aM ku shi /a ba lo kA ya/ mA na sA

d+ha ya sid d+hi ra/ A kar+Sha ya/ mu drA man+t+ra/ maN+Da la/ pa Ta laM/ sa ma ya/ big+haM pra sA d+ha ya mA raM/ ha ra ha ra/ sarba pA pa ki la bi Sha ma la/ mA ta sar+ya/ hu ru hu ru/ ma hA aM ku shi /hU~M hU~M/ bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ bo d+ha ya bo d+ha ya/ tu ru tu ru/ ma hA bo d+hi sa twa aM ku sha rat+na pA shaM d+ha ra/

nA nA bi tsi tra A b+ha ra Na bi b+hU Shi ta/ a mi tA b+ha/ dzi na ma ku Ta d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ pad+ma pA sha aM ku sha d+ha ra/ sarba bid+yA man+t+ra mu drA maN+DA la/ bra bar/ sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ bi shwa rU pa d+ha ra/ sa ha srab+hu dza/ sa ha sra ne tra/ sau mya mu kha/ pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka sa twa bta sa la/ sarba man+tA mu drA/

pra sA d+ha ka /ma hA ba ra da sa dA na maHstu te/ a mo g+ha aM ku sha /pad+ma b+hu dza swA hA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'di skad smras ma thag tu ri po Ta la chen po brag dang / nags tshal dang / skyed mos tshal du bcas pa'i gnas

kyi gzhal med khang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi char chen po bab bo/ /don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag byas pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba'i cho ga

zhib mo 'di'ang so sor le'ur phye ba mtha' dag rdzogs par nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang gsang sngags kyi yig 'bru'ang gser la bai DUr+yas yi ger bris pa sprin gyi rim pa na snang ste/ yi ge'i phreng ba mnyam zhing gsal la zur phyin par bris pa/ thig gi phreng ba gshibs pas brgyan pa snang ngo / gang

lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang pad+ma'i nang nas byung ba/ phyag rgya bcing ba sna tshogs 'od zer 'bar ba nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+ma la rab tu gnas pa nam mkha' la gnas par gyur to/ /gang ras kyi ri mo'i sku gzugs/ gzugs rnam pa sna tshogs

'dzin pa/ rnam par bkra ba cho ga dang / yo byad dang bcas pa rim par phye ba bris pa'ang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /gang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba de dkyil 'khor rnam pa sna tshogs gru bzhi pa/ grwa bzhi cha mnyam pa rnam par phye ba dkyil 'khor shin tu spras shing brgyan pa/ gzugs

rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes pa'i gzhal med khang yang nam mkha' la gnas so/ /dkyil 'khor chen po na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha pho nya dang / khro bo dang bcas pa gzhal med khang na rjes su rgyu ba dag kyang nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/

phyogs so so'i de bzhin gshegs pa mang po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang phyogs bcu kun gyi nam mkha'i dkyil na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bzhugs par gyur to/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'

chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug legs so legs so/ /rig sngags kyi mchog dam pa don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po mtha' dag rdzogs par smras pa gang gis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i

snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga zhib mor gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba de dag thams cad don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gsang sngags kyi zhags pas kun nas drangs so/ /'khor 'di'i nang na nam mkha'i dkyil na rab tu gnas pa de phyi ma'i tshe phyi

ma'i dus na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/

khye'u'am/ bu mo rig sngags 'dzin pa thams cad kyis don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'di dran par byed na lan cig dran pa tsam gyis kyang mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag

byas pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba dang / cho ga zhib mo de thams cad so sor de la kha ton nyid du gnas te/ de dag thams cad rim gyis dran pa dang / blo rgya mtsho

bsags pa dang / shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba so so la blo 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /nam yang blo dman par mi 'gyur zhing nam yang brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs

pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ mchog chen po sbyin pa/ lag na pad+ma/ mchog tu snying rje can khyod kyis cho ga rgya chen po smras pa legs so legs so/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde

dpon chen po phyag na rdo rjes rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul gyi yon tan mtha' yas pa 'di mthong nas dbugs cher 'byin par gyur cing mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob bo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor 'di'i nang du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i bya ba'i yo byad dang cho ga bshad do/ /bcom ldan 'das de nas rig sngags 'chang gang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod

pa'i zhags pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di bsgrub par 'tshal ba dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong pha'am/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/

bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan su yang rung ba bud med dang / skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'di klog par 'tshal ba dang / bstan par 'tshal ba dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga bgyi bar

'tshal ba dang / mtha' dag rdzogs par bsgrub par 'tshal ba des sngon rol du phyogs bcur thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su kha bltas te mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i snying po 'di lan gsum dran par bgyi zhing / yang thal mo sbyar te phyag bgyi'o/

de nas dran pa tsam gyi mod la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bkug par 'gyur te/ ri bo Ta la'i gzhal med khang dang bcas pa dang / 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin

dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gnyis pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis phyag bgyis

pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas pa gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo dang / sgrub pa'i cho ga'i rnam pa rgya chen po mtha' dag rdzogs pa 'di yang bkug par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i rig sngags kyi lha 'khor dang bcas pa bkug par 'gyur te/

thams cad yid rab tu dga' bar gyur pas dngos grub dam pa rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying po dran par bgyi ste/ ji ltar shin tu rgya cher yid la bgyis pa de ltar bsgrub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug nyid kyi kha nas dran pa

mnyan zhing rgya che ba dang / blo dang mdangs dri ma ma mchis par 'jug par bgyid de/ zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la lce pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bur 'jam par 'gyur zhing / kha nas ut+pa la'i dri 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /dbyangs snyan cing mnyen pa dang / 'jam pa dang / zab pa dang / tshig rnam

par dag par 'gyur ro/ /mi 'am ci'i dbyangs dang / sgra snyan pa dang / dbyangs mnyen pa dang / dga' bar byed pa'i dbyangs su 'gyur zhing ka la ping ka'i dbyangs su 'gyur ro/ /ji ste dus gsum du lan gsum du dran par bgyi na gsang sngags dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / dkyil

'khor dang / phyag rgya rim par phye ba dang / cho ga thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs spyi'i dngos grub de rdzogs par 'gyur zhing spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang log 'dren dang bdud la sogs pa sdang ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ sngon

gyi sgrib pa dang / dmyal bar mchi ba'i sdig pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'di lan gsum dran par bgyis pa tsam gyis skad cig de nyid kyi mod la bdag rang dang /

rang gi gnas kyi khang pa dang / slob ma dang / bsnyen bkur dang / 'khor dang bcas pa mi gtsang ba yang gtsang bar 'gyur/ yongs su ma dag pa'ang shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bcas pa'ang shin tu dri ma ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /zhe sdang dang bcas pa'ang zhe sdang dang

bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gti mug dang bcas pa'ang gti mug dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /'dod chags dang bcas pa'ang 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sgrib pa dang bcas pa'ang sgrib pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang log 'dren

gyis yongs su zin pa'ang bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / bdud la sogs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /sems kyi sdig pa'ang sdig pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /thun mong ma yin pa'ang thun mong du gyur cing bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs ma mchis par

yang mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /smyung ba ma bgyis pa'ang smyung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang yul dang dkyil 'khor thams cad du tshangs par mi spyod pa'ang tshangs par spyod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa'i gnas chen po la gnas

par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba mi spyod pa'ang dge ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /chos mi spyod pa'ang chos spyod pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams mi bgyid pa'ang bsod nams kyi phung po chen po 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /dul ba'i spyod pa mchis pa'ang dul ba'i spyod pa chen

po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags ma mthong ba dang / dam tshig ma mchis pa'ang dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags mthong ba dang / dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags kyi gnas dang 'khor thams cad

du sangs rgyas dang / chos mthong bar mi 'tshal ba'ang byang chub dang / chos dang / dam tshig dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma bsams pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsams par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi yul du

ma gyur pa'ang byang chub kyi sa bon dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa dang mi 'bral zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /tshul khrims dang mi 'bral zhing ting nge 'dzin rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /sbyin pa dang

yongs su gtong ba dang mi 'bral zhing sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i tshogs chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /bzod pa dang mi 'bral zhing bzod pa chen po'i bzod pa'i rjes su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /brtson 'grus dang mi 'bral zhing brtson 'grus kyi stobs chen po'i go cha

brtan pa bgos par 'gyur ro/ /bsam gtan dang mi 'bral zhing bsam gtan chen po 'thob pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /shes rab dang thabs cad la mkhas pa zhan pa'ang shes rab dang thabs la mkhas pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags dang / gsang sngags

nyams pa'ang / gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya yongs su tshang ba dang / cho ga la mkhas par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po'i lam la rab tu gnas par 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad du snying du sdug pa dang / bla mar

bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /sems can thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / mngon du phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro/ /tshig btsun par yang 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa yongs su dag par yang 'gyur ro/ /de ltar don yod pa chen po'i cho ga rgya chen po 'di dag ni thams cad du dngos grub don yod pa/

mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba/ dge ba don yod pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'dren par bgyid do/ /dngos grub thams cad 'gugs par bgyid do/ /sgrub pa thams cad 'dren par bgyid do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ji snyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / sangs

rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / don dam pa dang / stong pa nyid 'dren par bgyid de don yod pa'i lcags kyu 'dis 'dres par bgyid/ yangs

par bgyid/ dngos grub mchog 'dren par bgyid do/ /de ltar mthu che ba dang / phan yon che ba dang / yon tan chen por brjod pas bsod nams kyi 'bras bu chen po stsol bar bgyid do/ /de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po dang ldan zhing kun tu sogs par bgyid pas rig sngags

kyi rgyal po don yod pa'i lcags kyu/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa lags so/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nam/

dge bsnyen ma'am/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs sam/ gzhan du yang rung ba/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rang gi gzugs kyis dgug par

'tshal ba dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'tshal na des cho ga 'di bgyi'o/ /gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ ba'i rnam lnga'i chu sa bsangs pa'i mchod phyir thogs btags pas ras dmar po'i

skud pa'i mchod phyir thogs kha dog bzang po gnas bdun du yongs su gzung ste/ mtshog ma dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / gnas gsum po dpung pa gnyis su bcing ba dang / lag ngar gnyis su bcing ba dang / de nas rked par bcings pas/ sa phyogs gtsang mar 'dug nas sam/

gnas gzhan gang yang rung ba dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi stegs gru bzhi pa shin tu rnam par mdzes pa khru bzhi'i tshad tsam la 'phang sor brgyad kyi tshad tsam kun nas zlum po legs par byugs pa shin tu 'jam pa bgyi'o/ /de nas tshon sna tshogs kyi skud pas rnam par

mdzes par thig gdab bcing tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis bri bar bgyi'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor ni khru gang tsam gyi tshad la gru bzhi pa rnam par phye ba/ shin tu mdzes pa/ gru bzhi kun nas kha khyer gyi rnam pa can bgyi'o/ /dbus su pad+ma bgyi'o/ /'dab ma brgya rtsa brgyad pa/ 'dab ma thams cad

la lcags kyu bri zhing dbus kyi snying po ge sar dang bcas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /'od kyi phreng ba zlum po tshon rtsi sna tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes par bgyi'o/ /snying po'o dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir lcags kyu dang zhags pa kun nas zlum po'ang bgyi'o/ /phyi rol gyi

dkyil 'khor kun du mtshan ma'i phyag rgya sna tshogs kyang bri bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi grwa bzhir rnam par phye bar rgyal po chen po bzhi 'bar ba'i nang na go cha bgos pa/ drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyid pa bri'o/ /sgo bzhi rnam par phye bar yang dkyil 'khor gyi lha bri bar

bgyi ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje 'chang zhi ba'i gzugs can bzhin 'dzum pa/ rdo rje 'gying bag can du 'dzin pa/ ri rab kyi steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /lho phyogs kyi sgor khro bo'i rgyal po drag shul gyi gzugs can 'jigs par bgyi dang / pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs

pa/ me tog kha phye ba'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa'o/ /nub phyogs kyi sgor dbang po rdo rje thogs pa/ mig gsum pa ri'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na mchis pa bri'o/ /byang phyogs kyi skor don yod pa'i zhags pa gdong khro gnyer can/ pad+ma dang zhags pa thogs pa/ pad+ma'i 'dab

ma'i steng na 'bar ba'i nang na lcags kyu dang lhan cig mchis pa bri'o/ /dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu gos dang / ba dan dang / mda' dang / rgyal mtshan kun gyis brgyan par bgyi'o/ /tshon sna lnga'i skud pas kho ra khor yug tu dkri bar bgyi'o/ /gtor ma thams cad dkar po gzhag

go/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol kun du dngul dang gser gyi snod rnam pa sna tshogs pa gzhag go/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu dngul gyi snod bkang ba bzhi dang / 'o mas bkang ba bzhi dang / mchod yon dang / zhabs bsil ba'i snod bzhi dang / dri'i snod bzhi dang / dris

bkang ba'i snod bzhi dang / dngul gyi phog por a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ska'i bdug spos bsregs pa bzhi gzhag go/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor kho ra khor yug tu sa las byas pa'i snod bkang ba dang / gtor ma'i snod bum pa yongs su bkang ba drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / bdug

pa sna tshogs bsregs pa'i pog phor brgyad 'jigs pa med par gzhag par bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes bcu bzhi nas zla ba nya tshes lnga'i bar gyi nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas 'bras yos dang / yungs kar la don yod pa'i rgyal po'i snying pos lan brgya

rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor du gtor bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar dang / dri chab la khro bo'i rgyal pos lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun du gtor zhing dkyil 'khor dbang bskur bar bgyi'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du mar me drug

cu rtsa bzhi spar bar bgyi'o/ /me tog ji snyed pa mang po dgram zhing kho ra khor yug tu phreng ba gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gis don yod pa'i lcags kyus yungs kar la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig yongs su bzlas pas dkyil 'khor kun dang / phyogs bzhi dang / steng dang / 'og

tu gtor na dkyil 'khor bcing ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /phyogs bcing ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / bdag bsrung ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / 'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad bcings

par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po gang dag mthong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i gzhi 'dzin pa de thams cad bkug par 'gyur ro/ /dkyil 'khor kun

nas bsrung ba'i slad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / gzhon nu dang / ku be ra dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang / 'khor dang bcas pa/ lcags kyu dang / zhags pas bkug par 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor kun nas bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/

'og gi sa'i lha mo sa'i 'og na gnas pa rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /steng nas nam mkha' la tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / mtshan mo'i lha dang / nyi ma

dang / zla ba rgyu skar dang bcas par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis phyag bgyi ba'i las bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gis rtswa ku sha'i steng du shar phyogs kyi sgor dkyil 'khor la mngon du phyogs par skyil mo krung bcas te/

mchis la gzhan mi smra bar don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas pa bgyis la/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying por 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gzhag par bgyi zhing / me tog re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi

mdun du dor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal pos yungs kar gyi 'bru re re la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas gtor bar bgyi'o/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod stong rtsa brgyad bgyis pas

dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ril bu re re la bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i bdug spos dbul bar bgyi'o/ /yungs kar re re la bzlas brjod bgyis la/ snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du dor bar bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / thun tha ma'i nam nangs kar gya nom pa/ yid du 'ong

zhing dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' bar bgyid par sa g.yo bar 'gyur zhing / sgra mnyen pa dang / snyan cing 'jebs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba zab mo zab mo dang / ka la ping ka dang / mi'am ci'i sgra dbyangs lta bu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang gi sems brtan por bgyi

zhing mchog tu dga' ba yid la bgyid pas bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /de nas dkyil 'khor gyi snying po nas 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs mang po 'byung zhing phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams kun tu mchi zhing snang bar 'gyur te/ nam mkha'i dkyil na sprin brtsegs pa'i phung po bzhin du

'od zer gyi gzugs su gyur nas gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sngon ma byung ba'i dri zhim po rmad du 'byung bar 'gyur zhing lha'i tsan+dan dang / go shiR+Sha'i tsan+dan dang / tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / ga bur dang / gla rtsi'i dri 'byung ste/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dri

gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lha rdzas kyi bdug spos kyi dri zhim po sngon ma byung ba rmad du byung ba bai DUr+ya sngon po'i sprin brtsegs pa lta bu'i bdug spos kyi sprin nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas par yang 'gyur te/ phyogs bcu kun tu bdug spos kyi dri rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas snying po'i

dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bdag nyid kyi rang gi gzugs kyis 'byung bar 'gyur te/ tshangs pa bzang po'i cha lugs can/ ral pa'i thog tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ don yod pa'i zhags pa'i gzugs lag pa bzhi pa/

pad+ma dang / zhags pa thogs pa/ rgyal ba 'od dpag tu med pa'i dbu rgyan can/ dbu rgyan zla ba tshes pas brgyan pa/ mdung rtse gsum pa thogs shing dbugs 'byin pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa/ rang gi 'od dang gzi brjid kyis

shin tu 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum zhing nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i 'od zer gyi snang ba dang ldan pa/ khru brgyad tsam gyi lus bzang pos dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ nam mkha' la mchis nas zhi ba'i gzugs can byams pa'i sems dang / snying rje chen po yid la

bgyis pas dkyil 'khor kun du lta zhing phyogs bcur rtog par bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung ste/ rig sngags 'chang chen po legs so legs so/ /lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba'i lag mthil shin tu bzang po 'od zer bye ba brgya stong

phrag stong gis legs par brgyan pa'i lag pa rig sngags 'chang gi spyi bor 'jog par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi lag pa spyi bor bzhag ma thag tu de nas rig sngags 'chang de nam mkha' la mchis te/ don yod pa'i zhags pa dang / lcags

kyu rgya chen po 'od zer snang ba bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba sgyu ma lta bu'i shugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma snyed 'thob bo/ /kun du don yod par lta ba nor bu'i snying po rgya chen por grags pa

don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi snying po'i gzungs 'thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis gzungs thob pa'i mod la don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags rim par phye ba'i cho ga zhib mo byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/ rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag rdzogs par kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /gzhan yang pad+ma rgya chen po'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dag dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / glang po che'i

rigs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig dang / gsang ba chen po'i snying po dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i gsang sngags rim par phye ba gsang ba dang / cho ga zhib mo'i rnam pa thams cad kha ton nyid du gnas so/ /rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur

ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag gang gA klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa gnyis pa rnams kyi gtso bo dang / mchog dang rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rig sngags 'chang de la smras pa/ rig sngags

'chang ji ltar yid la byed pa dang / bsam pa smros shig dang / mchog de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar yid la bsams pa dang / mchog mngon par 'dod pa de thams cad smra zhing mchog yid la re ba thams cad sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /

gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dgos pa sna tshogs da ltar byung ba rnams smra zhing 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba smra'o/ /lo legs pa dang / lo nyes pa dang / bde ba dang / nad dang / 'jigs pa dang / lhag par 'jigs pa dang /

pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang / rang gi dmag tshogs dang / phyir rgol ba dang / dgra bo dang / yams kyi nad dang / mi ngas dang / gnod pa dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'tshe ba dang / gza' 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / mtshang 'du ba dang / 'gyed pa dang / g.yul

'gyed pa dang / char ches pa dang / char dkon pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / tshe ring ba dang / tshe thung ba dang / tshe yongs su zad pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba gang / 'byor pa dang / rgyud pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / 'grub pa dang /

mi 'grub pa dang / bgegs dang / bgegs med pa dang / bdud kyi bar chad dang / 'bru 'phel ba dang / nor 'phel ba dang / nad mang ba dang / nad dang bral bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de thams cad par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang la smra bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can dmyal ba dang / dang / lha ma yin gyi 'jigs rten dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / grul bum dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang

mi ma yin pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / bya'i skye ba dang / 'chi ba de thams cad phyin ci ma log par smra zhing de dag gi thams cad kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /lhar skye ba dang / klur skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing skye ba dang / rgyal po nyid dang / bud

med dang / skyes pa nyid dang / bu rnyed pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bram ze'i rigs su skye ba dang / rgyal rigs su skye ba dang / khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bur skye ba de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang rigs mthon po dang / dma' ba dang /

smad pa'i rigs su skye ba sna tshogs de dag thams cad ston cing smra la/ thabs kyang ston par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis ji ltar bsams pa'i don de thams cad 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang mngon sum du smra zhing thams cad gtam zer ro/ /gzhan

yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis 'jig rten pa'i mchog sna tshogs dang / sgrub pa dang / grub pa de thams cad de la stsol bar bgyid de/ 'di lta ste nor bsgyur ba smra ba dang / zhing smra ba dang / mgo sman gyi dngos grub dang / mi snang ba dang / mig 'phrul dang /

gter smra ba dang / phug tu 'jug pa dang / nags su 'jug pa dang / spo pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbab pa dang / ro langs bslang ba dang / nad zhi bar bya ba dang / gos 'thob pa dang / grong 'thob pa dang / yul gyi bdag po nyid dang / chu klung chen po rgal ba dang / dug

bza' ba dang / gsang sngags sna tshogs sgrub pa'i dngos grub dang / 'jigs pa chen po brgyad zhi bar bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / dran pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /gzhan yang ji ltar yid la bgyid pa de thams cad stsol bar bgyid do/ /de dag thams cad kyi dgos pa

thams cad don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu'i snying pos 'dren cing / don yod pa'i zhags pas bcing bar 'gyur ro/ /bsams pa dang / don du gnyer ba dang / yid la re ba'i dgos pa de thams cad shin tu ring po nas kyang don yod pa'i zhags pas bcings nas thams cad drangs te

lag tu thob par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi de kho na nyid thams cad 'grub par 'gyur te/ mi snang bar gyur/ rig sngags 'chang nam mkha' la mche bar 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du mchi 'tshal ba de dang de thams cad du mchi bar

gyur te thams cad du gtso bor 'gyur/ thams cad du mchod par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste rmi lam du mthong bar 'tshal na gu gul la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas nas/ nyal kar 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bdug spos su phul te nyal na/ 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po'i cha byad du mthong ba stsol cing / gang bsams pa dang / gang du gnyer ba dang / gang dris pa de thams cad smra bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar bsams pa'i mchog stsol cing sgrib pa dang sdig pa thams cad ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /stobs dang / brtson

'grus dang / mdangs 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dgug par 'tshal zhing mthong bar 'tshal na/ de'i tshe shing arga'i 'o ma dang / gu gul dang / rgya skyegs kyis ril bur bgyis pa la bzlas brjod brgya rtsa brgyad bgyis la/ tshangs pa la bdug spos su phul nas/

tshangs pa rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na ma mchis shing mchog 'tshal ba thams cad rjes su stsol to/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten la thug pa'i bar gyi tshangs pa'i gnas dang / gzhal med khang mthong bar 'gyur zhing tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi cha byad 'chang ba'i mchog stsol bar 'gyur

ro/ /lha'i gnas thams cad du mes po yin no zhes tshig mngon par brjod par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten thams cad dang / 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang /

dmangs rigs de thams cad thams cad du tshangs pa'o zhes sems par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po btsun mo dang / 'khor du bcas pas mchod pa'i sprin chen po bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sred med kyi bu dgug par 'tshal ba des lha'i gnas su sred med kyi bu'i gzugs brnyan gyi mdun du nye bar

sbyin sreg gi cho ga bgyi ste/ rig sngags 'chang gtsang mar gyur pa shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa/ sna ma dang shing arka'i yam sreg shing gi me sbar ba la gu gul dang / yungs kar dang / sbrang rtsi dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyi'o/ /brgya stong rdzogs

pa dang / sred med kyi bu rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so zhes smra'o/ /sgrub pa dam pa 'di don yod pa'i lcags kyus 'gugs shing rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i chos lugs chen pos bkug na rig sngags 'chang

ci zhig bya/ dgos pa ni ci zhig yod/ mchog ni ci zhig don du gnyer ba de smros shig dang / thams cad rjes su sbyin par bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis don gang yid la bsams te smras pa de thams cad stsol bar 'gyur/ gzugs sna tshogs pa'i mchog kyang rjes

su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang gzugs sna tshogs pa mchog gtso bo dang dgos pa'i las sgrub pa'i mchog rjes su stsol bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa des lha'i gnas su

mchis pa la lha chen po'i mdun du gu gul dang / pad+ma'i phye ma dang zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / lha chen po rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas nag po chen po dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang

shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas dur khrod du mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas pad+ma sar pa'i phye ma dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / yungs kar dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba brgyad stong don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i

bzlas brjod kyis dur khrod kyi shing gi me la bzlas brjod bgyi'o/ /ra khrag gi gtor ma dang 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi lha bshos dang / me tog dmar po dbul bar bgyi'o/ /las 'di yongs su rdzogs par bgyis na nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa mdun na

mchis shing rig sngags 'chang la legs so zhes bya ba gsol te/ rig sngags 'chang legs so legs so/ /sgrub pa'i cho ga bzang po 'dis bdag yongs su mgus rig sngags 'chang smros shig dang mchog rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/ /mchog 'dod pa thams cad rjes su long

shig dang / ji ltar yid la byed pa re ba de thams cad rjes su sbyin par bgyi'o/ /khyod bsrung ba dang / yongs su bskyang ba'i don du bdag rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mchod yon dang zhabs bsil dbul bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar bsams pa de

mngon sum du smras na/ gang don du gnyer ba de thams cad 'thob cing thams cad du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dran pa tsam la sogs pas las thams cad bgyid cing nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu lta zhing spyir thams

cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs dang / las su bgyi ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ma mo'i tshogs kyi 'khor thams cad dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ las thams cad bsgo ba bzhin du bgyid par 'gyur te/ nam yang nyams par mi bgyid do/ /thams cad

rjes su 'brang zhing las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /ci ste 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma dgug par 'tshal na de nas rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas shin tu dri zhim po'i dris lus lhag par bsgos la/ gang na me tog gi shing ljon pa

mchis pa der mchis la/ zla ba mar gyi ngo'i tshes bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis pas shin tu dri zhim pa'i dri'i shing gi me sbar bal pu shel tse dang / ta kar dang / spang spos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang / sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg lan

stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /gla rtsi dang / ga bur dang / tsan+dan gyi chus bsgos pa'i 'bras yos dang / me tog gis bkang ba'i mchod yon gyi snod bum pa sar pa brgyad stsal lo/ /dkar gsum gyi gtor mas bkang ba ga bur gyis bsgos pa'i gtor ma'i bum pa gsum stsal lo/ /

me tog shin tu dri zhim po stsal bar bgyi zhing gla rtsi dang / tsan+dan dang / ga bur dang / kun tu ru'i bdug spos stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / 'dod pa'i gzugs can ma bzang mo de lha'i gzhal med khang du mchi zhing mdun na mchis te/ de mthong nas

ma'am/ sring mo'am/ chung ma'am/ las byed pa'am/ mngag gzhug ma'am/ pho nya ma rnams ji lta bur ji ltar tshig tu brjod pa de la smros shig dang / ci ste mar gyur na de'i tshe bu bzhin du snying nas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / dbyig dang / gser

dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / mal chas yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste sring mor gyur na de'i tshe longs spyod thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar bgyid do/ /ji ltar yid la bsams pa'i bud med dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol nas kyang bkug ste/ yongs su

longs spyad pa'i phyir yongs su spyod par bgyid cing phyir yang de nyid du gtong bar bgyid do/ /ci ste chung mar gyur na de dang / lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dam pa yongs su longs spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mthong ste/ lha rdzas kyi bza' ba dang btung ba dang / longs spyod stsol bar bgyid

do/ /ro bro ba'i mchog ro brgya dang ldan pa ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i longs spyod stsol bar bgyid do/ /mchog tu dga' ba'i rtsed mos 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i longs spyod la yongs su spyod par bgyid do/ /lha rdzas kyi dri dang / me tog dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / lha rdzas

kyi gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub kyis brgyan pa'i gzhal med khang du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / mdzod dang / bang ba yongs su gang zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /nor bu dang / gser dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / gser dang / shang ka shI la dang / byi ru dang /

dngul dang / sa le sbram dang / dngul skyog dpag tu med pa thob pa'i gter stsol bar bgyid do/ rta dang / ba lang dang / ma he dang / phyugs dang / bran pho dang / bran mo rab tu mang po mang por 'phel zhing mchis par 'gyur ro/ /mal cha'i longs spyod sna tshogs stsol bar

bgyid do/ /lha rdzas kyi chung ma'i longs spyod bud med gzugs sna tshogs pa'i 'khor brgya dang ldan pa nyin gcig bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs pas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig

sngags 'chang gis bag yod par bgyi ste/ dkon mchog gsum la mchog tu gus pa dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / rdo rje 'dzin la mchog tu gus par bgyi'o/ /rtag tu sbyin pa la mngon par dga' bar bgyi zhing sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying brtse

bar bgyi'o/ /gzhan du mi smra bar bgyi'o/ /gal te las byed par gyur na de'i tshe rgyal po la bgyi ba bzhin du las thams cad bgyid de/ shin tu yongs su rdzogs kyi bar du las la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste mngag gzhug mar gyur na gnas gang du mngag pa de'i gnas thams

cad du mchi ste/ dpag tshad stong gi pha rol du mchi zhing / skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /thams cad du gter chen po 'byin par bgyid 'dren par bgyid do/ /dpag tshad stong gi pha rol nas bud med 'gugs par bgyid cing / nor dang / 'bru dang / glang po che dang / ma he dang

rta dag 'gugs par bgyid de/ slar yang gtong bar bgyid do/ /bag yod pas bsgo bar bgyi ste/ bdag nyid shin tu ring po'i yul dang / gnas su 'phen par bgyid/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin gyi gnas su 'degs par bgyid de/

der srog gi bar chad du 'gyur bar mi bgyid do/ /ji ste pho nya mor gyur na phyogs bcu thams cad du mchi ste/ lha'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/ /klu'i 'jig rten du mchi'o/ /lha ma yin gyi gnas su mchi'o/ /nam mkha' lding gi gnas su mchi'o/ /mi 'am ci'i gnas su

mchi'o/ /lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang srin po'i gnas su mchi'o/ /'byung po'i gnas su mchi zhing thams cad du pho nya'i bya ba bgyis nas slar mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du mchi zhing mchi'o/ /skad cig gis dpag tshad stong du thams cad du

phyin nas pho nya'i bya ba bgyid do/ /ji srid sa'i 'og gi bar du 'jug cing phyir yang mchi'o/ /bya ba shin tu yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bag yod pas yang las thams cad bgyi ste/ nyin gcig bzhin du mchod yon dang / rkang pa bkru ba stsal bar bgyi'o/ /thams cad kyi

gnas thams cad du phyin cing bya ba 'grub pa/ bla na ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gnod sbyin mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des gzhan gyis ma reg pa'i shing leb sar pa la gnod sbyin dang / gnod sbyin mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi zhing

gnas dben zhing 'khrug pa ma mchis pa gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pas gos gtsang ma bgos pas 'o ma dang / 'bras thug po che'i chan gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /shing ka ra bI ra'i me sbar ba la yungs kar

dang / gu gul dang / ra'i khrag dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyi'o/ /stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs pa dang / me tog dmar po stsal na gnod sbyin mo de yang rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ rig sngags 'chang slongs shig ces smra bar 'gyur ro/ /

rig sngags 'chang gis khyod nga'i ci bgyi zhes bya ba byed pa yin no/ /nga'i las thams cad byed pa yin no/ /nga la dbyig mang po byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o/ /de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin mo de ltar legs so zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe dgos pa byung ba

de'i tshe yungs kar dang / gu gul la yongs su bzlas nas mer gtor na de mchi zhing ci bgyi zhes bya ba thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dbyig stong stsol bar 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur/ rtag tu ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo dgug

par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des spra tshil las lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bgyi'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis gnas 'khrug pa ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / sa phyogs gtsang ma'i gnas su gzhag par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus

bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pas zhag gsum zan bcad par bgyis la/ de'i mdun du skyil mo krung bcas te mchis la gu gul gyi bdug spos stsal cing dkar gsum gyi gtor ma stsal bar bgyi'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyus bzlas brjod yungs kar la bzlas pas bu mo de la lan

stong rtsa brgyad brdeg par bgyi'o/ las yongs su rdzogs pa dang / de nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo de rang gi gzugs kyis mdun na mchis te/ gang dang gang du dgos pa de dang der dgos pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur/ thams cad du mchi

par 'gyur/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste srin po dang / srin mo dgug par 'tshal na gu gul dang / ba lang gi sha skam po dang lhan cig bsres pa la don yod pa'i lcags kyus lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas dur khrod du mtshan thog thag bdugs

na srin po'i gnas thams cad kyi sgo phye bar 'gyur te srin po dang / srin mo rnams dbang du gyur nas gnas te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid par 'gyur/ ci bsgo ba de bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /gdugs gcig bzhin

du dngul chu srang khri stsol bar bgyid do/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang gis cha gsum du dbye bar bgyi ste/ cha gcig ni dkon mchog la mchod par bgyi'o/ /cha gnyis pa ni gcig bzhin du sbyin par gtang ngo / /srin mo rnams la zan dang / tshod sngon rlon pa'i gtor ma stsal bar

bgyi'o/ /de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa de rnams tshim par 'gyur ro/ /de nas srin po 'khor dang bcas pa shin tu mgyogs par 'gyur te/ shugs chen pos dgos pa thams cad grub cing nam yang gzhan du bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/ /gtor ma gtsang ma stsal

bar bgyi'o/ /ji ste sha za dang / sha za mo dgug par 'tshal na ba lang gi mkhris pa dang / de'i song dang / gu gul dang / shing arka'i 'o ma sbyar te/ lam gyi bzhi mdor bdug par bgyi zhing / lhag ma dang 'bags pa'i gtor ma stsal na/ sha za mo de mchi zhing rig sngags 'chang gi mdun

du mchis te/ ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid pa'i bran du 'gyur/ las thams cad bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad stong gi pha rol tu mchi zhing skad cig gis slar yang mchi'o/ /dgos pa thams cad sgrub par bgyid do/ /dus gsum du gtor ma lhag ma'i gtor ma sgo drung du stsal bar

bgyi'o/ /nyin gcig bzhin du gser gyi dong tse brgya sngas su 'jog par 'gyur te/ des thams cad zad par bgyis na phyir zhing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ste rgyal po'i btsun mo dgug par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang gtsang ma shin tu khrus bgyis pa gos gtsang ma bgos pa

des yungs kar dkar po dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gi'u wang dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / rgyam tsha dang / lan tshwa bsres pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad yongs su bzlas na phye ma'i rdzas su bgyis la yungs kar dang / ske tshe'i sa bon dang / sbrang rtsi'i sa bon lan cig mnyes

la yang lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te/ rgyal po'i sgo 'am/ lam gyi bzhi mdo'am/ lam po che'am/ grong khyer gyi sgor gtor na gang der gom pa bor ba tsam gyis dbang du gyur nas gnas te ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid do/ /rgyal po btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa bkug

cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du ci bgyi ba'i bya ba bgyid cing / bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /gang bslangs pa de ster te dngul dang / gser dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / lhab lhub dang / spud pa dang / bzhon pa dang / mal cha dang / 'bru la sogs pa stsol

bar bgyid do/ /gang smras pa de bgyid cing gang bsgo ba bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de'i yul gcig tu yang 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po bgyid par 'gyur zhing thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /de nas bram ze dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ rig sngags

'chang des nas dang / til dang / 'bras sA lu dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang bsres pa'i sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad bgyis na/ rig byed bzhi dang ldan pa'i bram ze thams cad kyis spyi bor bkur ba gcig pur 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod pa bgyid

par 'gyur zhing bram ze thams cad la dbang bgyid pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal rigs dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal na til dang / 'bras thug po che dang / sran mu dag dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar bsres pa'i sbyin sreg bgyi ste/ sbyin sreg

stong rtsa brgyad kyi bar du bgyis na thams cad la dbang bsgyur zhing mchod pa'i 'os chen por 'gyur ro/ /thams cad dbang du 'gyur bar bgyid do/ /ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bgyid de ci bgyi ba bgyid cing bsgo ba bzhin bgyid par 'gyur ro/ /de nas dmangs rigs dbang du bgyi

bar 'tshal na lan tshwa dang / 'bras sA lu'i phub ma dang / su mu kha'i sa bon dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgya stong bgyis na dmangs rigs thams cad bran du gyur nas gnas te/ ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mchis par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang

phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des shing mngar gyi shing gi me sbar ba la/ sa bon bdun dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong ba bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs pa dang / dgra

dang phyir rgol ba dang / phas kyi dgra thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'tshal na shing tsher ma can gyi me sbar ba la 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / zhun mar dang sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg

brgyad stong bgyi'o/ /brgyad stong rdzogs na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad bzlog par 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa bzlog par 'tshal na ske tshe'i sa bon dang / gu gul dang / b+hang ga'i sa bon dang / zho ga chu dang / zhun mar dang

sbyar ba'i sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis na g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du son pa'i sems can thams cad slar bzlog par 'gyur zhing / thams cad du rgyal ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas gdon thams cad las thar bar bgyi bar 'tshal na rig sngags 'chang des bdug pa

'di sbyar ba 'tshal bar bgyi ste/ k+She ma ka dang shing mngar dang / /tsa rong dang ni gu gul dang / /mu ra ya k+Sha mu ra dang / /b+hu ta ke shi mnyam par gzhal/ /phub ma dang ni pa la ka /khyim bya'i sgo nga'i shun lpags dang / /sbrul lpags dang ni yung rnam

gnyis/ /b+ha ga'i sa bon ba lang mkhris/ /nya dang legs par sbyar bgyis te/ /ra yi gcin gyis bsgos pa la/ /lcags kyu'i gsang sngags bzlas pa yis/ /bdug pa dam pa'i gtso bo 'di/ /thams cad du ni rigs pa ste/ /stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa

bzhi gdon/ /gang dag sa steng gnas pa rnams/ /bdug pa'i dri 'dis 'jig 'gyur zhing / /mi bzad gdon rnams 'bros par 'gyur/ /phyogs bcu dag ni g.yo 'gyur zhing / /sum cu'i lha dang ri rab g.yo/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i gnas dag

dang / /sdang ba'i srog chags chen po 'tshig /gzhan yang sna tshogs dug bcas pa'i/ /srog chags thams cad 'jig 'gyur ba/ /dri tsam gyis ni dogs pa med/ /bdug pa 'dis ni bdug byas na/ /der ni rims nad mi gnas te/ /nyin gcig pa

yi rims dang ni/ /nyin gnyis pa dang bzhi pa'i rims/ /gang yang mi bzad khyab 'jug rims/ /de dag thams cad 'jig 'gyur zhing / /skad cig gis ni gtan nas 'joms// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i

rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ de nas mig bsku ba'i sman brjod par bya'o/ /gdon thams cad 'joms pa gang gis mig bskus pa tsam gyis gdon ma rungs pa 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /ro stod kyi nad thams cad 'joms par 'gyur te/ mig bskus pa tsam gyis

de thams cad med par 'gyur te dogs pa mi bya'o/ /mig gi nad ni ling tog dang / skya bor gyur pa dang / rab rib dang / chu bur can dang / chu zags pa dang / tshag po dang / ha sa rA dza dang / byis pa'i mchi ma dang / mig tu sme ba byung ba dang / khrag dang /

rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa dang / rdul 'byung ba dang / 'brum bu dang / g.ya' ba dang / mig skams pa dang / mdongs pa dang / klad pa na ba dang / klad pa'i gzhogs phyed na ba dang / kha nad dang / kha na ba dang / dpral ba na ba de dag thams cad

'joms par 'gyur ro/ /mig sman gyis mig bskus pa tsam gyis rims thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang / nad thams cad sel ba dang / mod la nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar na mig sman

mchog tu grub pa/ bgegs thams cad sel ba dang / ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sems can thams cad la dbang byed pa/ thams cad du rgyal bar byed pa/ mig sman rtag tu mchog tu dkon pa/ gsad pa la thug pa thar bar byed pa/

btson ra nas gang thar bar byed pa/ rgyal po dag gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur te/ nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag tu bu bzhin yongs su skyong zhing gnas pa/ dug thams cad mod la med par byed pa ni/ mig sman mchog yin no/ /bsam pa ngan cing

sdang ba'i sems can dang / dgra dang phyir rgol ba dang / dgra dang / 'gyed pa dag mig sman gyis bskus pas mthong na dbang du 'gyur te gnas so/ /ma he gtum po dang / glang po che dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / steng ga mthon po nas g.yang du ltung ba

dang / me'i phung po dang / khyim rdib pa dang / g.yang sar ltung ba rnams mig sman gyis mig bskus pas mthong na zhi bar 'gyur zhing / gzhan yang bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed de 'di la dogs par mi bya'o/ /yung ba dang / skyer pa dang / na phe sham

dang / pi pi ling dang / shring ga be ra dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / ut+pal sngon po dang / ldong ros dang / gur gum la sogs pa'i mig sman dang / rgyam tsha dang / spang spos dang / rgya mtsho'i sbu ba dang / dung phye dang / 'di rnams lhan cig tu phye ma zhib mor

byas pa la gsang sngags lan bdun bzlas te ga bur dang / gla rtsi bsnan pa'i mig bsku ba'i sman lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i gsang sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas te/ mig bskus na dri ma thams cad sel zhing sdig pa dang / gzhan sdug bsngal

thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/ /mun pa thams cad kyi nang du nyi ma bzhin du skye bo thams cad kyi nang du mdzes par 'gyur ro/ /de nas ril bu bshad par bya ste/ sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa/ nad thams cad sel bar 'grub pa/ bgegs thams

cad med par byed pa/ gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ mod la dug thams cad med par byed pa/ nyon mongs pa'i dri ma thams cad sel ba/ bcings pa thams cad gcod par byed pa/ g.yul thams cad

las rgyal ba sbyin zhing dge ba/ dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ rtag tu dug thams cad 'joms pa/ rgyal po'i sgor mdzes par 'gyur ba/ nor dang 'bru 'phel bar 'gyur ba/ rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / chu dang / me dang / dug dang / glang

po che med par byed pa/ sbrul ma rungs pa dang / byi ba'i dug gis 'jigs pa dang / khyim 'jigs pa dang / ri snyil ba dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / dom la sogs pa rab tu rgyu ba dang / gnod pa dang / bcings pa'i tshe 'gro bar dka' ba 'byung

ba dang / nad dang rims 'joms pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba med par byed pa/ tshe dang nad med par byed pa 'phel ba/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu ma rnams mchog tu bde bar 'gyur ba ste/ gang gis ril bu bcangs na thams cad du rgyal

ba 'thob cing gdon 'byung bar mi 'gyur/ rnam par log 'dren gyis ma yin no/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed ma rungs pa rnams ril bu mthong ba tsam gyis phyogs bcur 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /'dis byis pa

gsod par mi byed do/ /sman 'di la reg pa tsam gyis khyim der dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / na ba thams cad dang / nad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lhog pa dang / 'brum phran mched pa dang / shu ba dang / g.yan

pa dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu mched pa dang / sha bkra la bskus pa tsam gyis byang bar 'gyur ro/ /lus thams cad du zhugs pa'i nad la chu dron po 'thungs pa tsam la sogs pas yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs skrag pa thams cad las rtag tu

rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa chen po las thams cad rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du song ba la sbyar ba byas na thams cad 'kho bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas rdzas su bya ba ni pu shel tse dang / tsan+dan dang / rgya spos dang / ru rta dang / rdo dre ga

dang / pad tra dang / tsha ma ka dang / sha mi dang / pad+ma pa tra dang / ut+pa la dang / nal da dang / 'bras bu gsum dang / tsha ba gsum dang / sug smel dang / btsod dang / su ga ri dang / ra dza n+ya rnam gnyis dang / spr-i ka dang / sra rtsi pog dang /

gur gum la sogs pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang / de dag kun bsres te/ zhib mor btags la/ kha ra dang / chu dang / sbyar bas ril bu byas la gsang sngags brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ grib ma la skams pa de ni sman grub pa yin te/ thams cad

rgyal bar byed cing dge ba yin no/ /rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la ril bu mchog bskus te/ gnas mthon por song ste/ dung gi sgra dang / rnga bo che dang / rdza rnga ji srid du thos pa de srid tsam du 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /dug dang

bcas pa ni thams cad dug med par 'gyur te dogs par mi bya'o/ /nad thams cad dang / mi ngas thams cad dang / yams kyi nad dang / lo nyes thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bde zhing lo legs pa nyid du 'gyur ro/ /gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa'i sems can sdig pa can

dmyal ba la gzhol bdag gis sgra thos pa tsam gyis sdig pa thams cad byang ste/ bde bar 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /gos la bdugs na bdag nyid mchod pa chen po 'thob cing thams cad la dbang byed par gnas pa dang / don

grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /nor dang 'bru rab tu 'phel zhing dgos pa sgrub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /thams cad mchod pa dang / rtag tu tshig gzung ba 'os par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po gang la khros pa las dgod cing smra bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med rnams kyi gnang

chen du 'gyur zhing rtag tu nad med par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / stobs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dpal dang gzi brjid dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu glang po che bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa dang / shi nas mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /

byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu zhes bya ba don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i

gzungs chen po'i cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor dang / don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po dang / dkyil 'khor chen po lta ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bklags pas 'grub pa/ don yod pa chen po rnam par 'phrul pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dam tshig grub pa lags so/ /gang gis pad+ma rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mtha' dag dang / phyag rgya dang / rim par phye ba dang / gsang sngags dang / cho ga dang / bde bar sgrub pa mtha' dag ni rigs kyi spyi thams cad kyi

dam tshig chen po'i rjes su 'jug pa 'grub par 'gyur ba lags so/ /'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'od dpag tu med pa'i snying po mchog dang po rdo rje rin po che rtse mo'i mchog dang

po'i dkyil 'khor gyi dam tshig las thams cad du rjes su zhugs shing dam tshig shes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ba de rig sngags 'chang ba de thams cad mchog tu grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can thams cad la

rjes su brtse ba'i slad du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor mang po'i dbus su bsgrag par bgyi'o/ /rigs bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams kyi sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par gzhig

pa'i phyir bshad par bgyi'o/ /grub pa yang dag par rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /

sems can dag pa chen po khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dag cing shin tu yongs su dag pa yin te/ legs so legs so/ /rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs

dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams la bstan par bya ba shod cig /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs thams cad kyi spyi'i grub

pa dam tshig gi rjes su 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so/ /ngas kyang de bzhin du de dag byin gyis brlabs so/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar

don yod pa'i rgyas pa'i pad+ma'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad pa/ don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i yang dag pa mchog grub pa/ sgrub pa dam pa ni sa dang ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi bya ba ni shin tu mdzes pa shin tu 'jam por bya'o/ /tshon sna lngas rnam par dbye

ba ni grwa dang bcas par rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri ba dang / dkyil 'khor gru bzhir thig gdab pa ni mnyam par thig gis dbye bar bya ste/ sgo bzhir cha dbye bar bya'o/ /chu zheng du khru bzhi tshad tsam du dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi

dkyil 'khor gyi snying po ni tshad khru do par byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i sga la bu dang / tshon sa las dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la pad+ma dkar po kha bye ba zlum por bya'o/ /pad+ma kha bye ba'i dbus su zhags pa dang / lcags kyu dang /

pad+ma gnas par bya ba ni klu mgo gdengs ka 'dra ba lcags kyu dang bcas pa dang / lag pa dang bcas pas pad+ma'i lcags kyus 'dzin pa dang / 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug par bya'o/ /tshon sna tshogs kyis bri'o/ /pad+ma kha bye ba'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu

ni lcags kyu dang bcas pa'i sgal bur bya'o/ /nang dang phyi'i bar du ni rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bya'o/ /lcags kyu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gis bya'o/ /zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni

mdung rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o/ /mdung rtse gsum pa'i phreng ba'i phyi rol gyi sga la bu ni phyag rgya phyag na thogs pa bri bar bya ste/ mtshon cha sna tshogs dang / me tog rnams so/ /kun la 'bar ba'i phreng ba dang / 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bri bar bya'o/ /phyag

gi phyag rgya'i phyir rol gyi sgal bu ni stegs bu dang 'dra bar bya'o/ /stegs bu'i phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni 'khor bar lcags kyu bri bar bya'o/ /snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwar ni rgyal po chen po bzhi go bgos pa lcags kyu dang / mdung rtse gcig pa thogs pa 'bar ba'i nang

na 'dug pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa skyil mo krung phyed du bcas te/ pad+mo'i gdan la 'dug par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol thog thag tu 'jigs pa med pas phyag mtshan rnams thams cad pad+ma la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o/ /sgo bzhi gnas su

pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams bri ba ni shar gyi sgor lag na rdo rje/ lhor ral pa gcig ma/ nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma/ byang du pho nya mo dang / rig sngags kyi lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi sgal bu ni me tog gi stegs bu

'dra ba bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor ni kun du ba'i lci bas bya'o/ /phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de la nas phyes pad+ma bri bar bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor kun du bum pa gang ba dang / dar btags pa'i mda' dang / dri'i snod bkang bas brgyan cing byug

pa'i chu dgang ba dang / bdug pa'i snod kyis brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang / dri chab dang / mchod yon gyi chab dang / 'bras bu dang / yon chab dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / gser gyi me tog dang / zangs kyi

me tog gis 'jigs pa med par brgyan par bya'o/ /mu tig dang / byi ru dang / rin po che bai DUr+ya dang / sngon po dang / margad dang / pad+ma rA ga rnams kyis de bzhin du brgyan to/ /dkyil 'khor kun du dung dang / bil ba dang / rtswa dar

b+ha dang / gser dang / dngul gyis brgyan par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi don du mchod pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor gyi lha bkra shis pa rnams dang / sgo bzhi'i gnas su dri chab kyi bum pa dar gyis brgyan te gzhag par bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol

thog thag tu ro sna tshogs kyi gtor ma gzhag pa dang / bum bu dang / byam bum dang / bum pa dang / rte gu dang / kham phor dang / bum pa gang ba rnams byas te gzhag go /pog phor dang / gtor ma bzang po sna tshogs dang / /

me tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ /phreng ba bzang pos brgyan par bya/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i ba dan gdags/ /tshon sna lnga pa'i srad bu seng ldeng gi phur bu la btags pa gzugs par bya/ kun du mar me'i phreng ba dang / mar me'i sdong bu bzhi yang de bzhin no/ /

mkhas pas dkyil 'khor gyi nang du bdug pa dbul ba ni a ga ru dang / tsan+dan dang / du ru ska dang / spr-i ka rnams kyis bdug pa ga bur dang / gla rtsis bsgos pa bya'o/ /dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi bdug pa ni gu gul dang / sa la ki dang /

kun tu ru'i bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang bas gos sar pa bgos te/ gtsang mar byas nas maN+Dal gyi las su bya ba'i cho ga dang / lcags kyu'i rig sngags bzlas brjod bya ba dang / slob ma gzhug cing dkyil 'khor gyi

dam tshig dang / phyag rgya dang / ba'i rnam lnga la reg par bya ste/ mkhas pas phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags brjod cing don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags chen po ni thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /mtshams bcing ba dang / phyogs bcing

ba dang / spyi gtsug bcing ba dang / 'jug pa dang / dam tshig dang / khrus bya ba dang / gos bgo ba dang / phyag 'tshal ba dang / bskor ba dang / de dag thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o/ /sbyin sreg dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga zhi

ba dang / rgyas pa dang / mngon spyod dang / dgug pa dang / spyan drang ba dang / gshegs su gsol ba dang / de bzhin du yang dag par sprul pa dang / las thams cad la rig sngags 'chang bas thams cad du sbyar na myur zhing rdzogs

par 'chang zhing des na grub pa bla na med par 'gyur ro/ /bgrang phreng dang / mkhrig ma'i gdu bu dang / srad bu se ral kha gtsang ma dang / rtswa dar b+ha dang / yungs kar dang / chu dang bsre ba dang / rtswa dar b+ha'i stan la mchod phyir thogs te/

skyil mo krung bcas nas las bya zhing pad+ma dang / mchod yon gyi dkyil 'khor la dbul ba dang / de dag rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du nges par bya'o/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags dran par bya ste/ grub pa mchog dang /

las thams cad sgrub pa dang / gang dang gang dgos pa la dran par bya'o/ /gsang sngags de nyid kyis slar gshegs su gsol lo/ /gsang sngags gzhan dang bsre bar mi bya ste/ phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags 'di ni dpa' bo gcig tu

bklags pas grub pa'i mchog /sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang byin gyis brlabs pa ste/ yang dag par 'grub cing mchog sbyin

par byed pa yin no/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor dam pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di mthong ba ni sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'dag cing sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa mi bzad pa rnams sngar bsags pa rnams rnam

par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten pa'i grub pa bde ba dang / 'jig rten pha rol tu 'bras bu chen po bde ba dang / shi ba'i dus byas nas bde ba can du song ste/ pad+ma'i nang nas rgyal ba'i spyan sngar rdzus te skye ba dang / kha ton byed na tshe

rabs dran par 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig 'chad pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed thams cad kyi sgo phye ste 'dug cing gang du 'dod pa der 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal ba thams cad kyis rnam par gzigs shing

spyi bor phyag bzhag ste/ dbugs 'byin par mdzad cing dus kun tu bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni skye ba'i tha ma yin te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar dang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du yin gyi/

gzhan du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten 'di na dga' bar 'gyur zhing bla ma dang / chos can dang / nor gyi mchod pa dang / sems can kun gyis mchod par 'os pa ni ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel ba dang /

gos dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang / rgyal po dang / btsun mor bcas pa thams cad bya ba ci yod ces bran bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa ni phyir mi ldog pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'di ngan 'gror yang 'gro bar mi

'gyur zhing rtag tu bde zhing dga' ba dang / sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / byams par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis lus can shin tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ /tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams kyis mchod par

'gyur ro/ /bsod nams kyi phung po 'phel bar 'gyur zhing nyi ma bzhin du gzi brjid 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /sdug cing bzang ba mchog tu blta bar 'os par 'gyur ro/ /dpal gyis dus rtag tu 'bar zhing shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs

pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi drung nas dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /bsod nams chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i dkyil

'khor du gang zhig zhugs pa tsam dang / dkyil 'khor de lta bu la me tog gcig dbul ba dang / ril bu gcig tsam gyi bdug pa dbul ba'i sems can de dag ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi me

tog sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing re rer yang gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /bdug

pa mang po rnam par phye ba'i sprin las tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying po dang / gor shir sha'i bdug pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i sprin rim par phye ba rab tu 'khrigs par 'gyur ro/ /de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba rab tu sbyin par mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa 'di ni mchog tu grub pa bla na med pa yin no/ /de dag gis me tog dang / bdug pas dkyil 'khor

mchod pa ni bsod nams kyi phung po chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po yongs su rdzogs pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ /sgrub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rtag tu

mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu mthong bar bzhed par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu bzhin 'dzum

par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / lha'i bu rnams srung ba dang / sbed pa dang / skyob pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang ba chen por

'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag rgyas btab cing byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro/ /de'i sa phyogs kyang mchod rten snyam du sems shing mchod rten ring bsrel can du 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag de la blta ba'i phyir song

ba'i sems can de dag sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / dug thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa dang / rims dang / mya ngan thams cad las bral bar 'gyur ro/ /nad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu sangs rgyas

dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyi bla mar 'gyur ro/ /dgra thams cad las phyir rgol ba thams cad dang / mi mdza' ba'i 'jigs pa las thar ba'i 'gyur ro/ /dus ma yin pa'i 'chi ba'i 'jigs

pa las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'di nas shin bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /tha na dang / bya dag gnas te phyogs su nye bar song ba de dag sgrib pa thams cad dang / de'i sngon gyi tshe la yongs su bsags pa de dag lhag

ma ma lus par yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/ /de dag thams cad bde 'gro la gzhol bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i 'jigs pa med par mthar byang chub la thug gi bar du'o// //de nas don yod pa'i lcags kyu ras la sku gzugs bri ba'i cho ga brjod

par bya ste/ gnas thams cad du bla na med pa grub pa ni sdig pa thams cad mod la sreg par byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad 'phrog pa de bzhin du nad thams cad sel ba/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par

thar ba/ sems can thams cad la phan par bya ba'i phyir gang dkyil 'khor chen por kun du lung bstan pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa/ mchog tu dkon pa yid la re ba thams cad 'phral du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba/ bkra shis thams cad sgrub pa/ bsod

nams thams cad sogs pa/ myur du nor dang / 'bru sbyin par mdzad pa/ sgrub pa yang dag pa grub par bya ba'i phyir gsang sngags 'grub pa/ bzlas brjod 'grub pa/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'grub pa/ pha rol tu phyin

pa bcu yongs su rdzogs pa de kho na nyid rnam par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i bsod nams chen po skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nam byang chub yang dag par thob kyi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po rab tu skye bar 'gyur ro/ /don yod pa'i lcags kyu cho 'phrul chen po'i ras kyi sku gzugs

chen po mthong ba la sogs pa ni phyis ngan 'gro'i gnas su mi 'gro zhing sdig pa'i las kyis mi gos pa dang / sngon gyi sgrib pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par 'jig pa dang / sdig pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / ngan song las thar bar

'gyur ba dang / dmyal ba mi bzad pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur ro/ /tshe rabs kun du bde ba dang / da ltar gyi 'di la mchog tu dkon pa'i bde ba lhun gyis grub pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bkren pa yang longs spyod dang / phyug po mtshungs pa med pa

mchog mod la thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /'khor bzang po bdog par 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po rnams kyis bla mar bya zhing rtag tu dus thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /dge sbyong dang / bram ze

dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa rnams rtag tu dbang du bya ste/ sdug cing thams cad bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dug pa ni ras kyi sku gzugs la mchod pa bla na med pa yin no/ /

ras gru bzhi khyon kun khru gang ngam/ khru do pa la legs par btags pa/ ras 'jam po thag ran bzang po shin tu dag par bkrus pa gtsang mar byas pa'am/ yang na dar yug gam/ yang na mon dar ram/ shun phrags la zla ba

yar gyi tshes lnga tshang ba'i bar du ras kyi sku gzugs bla na med pa bri bar bya'o/ /snod gtsang ma sar pa'i nang du tshon lhag ma ma yin pa blugs te/ ras kyi sku gzugs gsal bar bri ba ni tshon sna tshogs kyis rnam par dbye bar bya'o/ /dbus su

'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mgon po bri ba ni skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs pa/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa/ mchog tu bzang ba/ zhal dang po ni mdzes shing sdug pa/ dbu lcang lo dang thor tshugs kyis brgyan pa/ cod

pan la 'od dpag med kyis brgyan pa/ dbu skra 'khyil bar bya'o/ /me tog gi phreng ba bcing bar bya'o/ /phreng ba'i gong du 'od dpag med bya'o/ /cod pan la zla ba phyed pa dang 'dom gang bya'o/ /kun du lcags kyu bya'o/ /kun du 'bar ba'i phreng ba bya'o/ /phyag bzhi la phyag

g.yon na pad+ma'i lcags kyu g.yas na mdung rtse gsum pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yon gcig na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i lcags kyu/ g.yas gcig na rdo rje lcags kyu dbugs 'byin par bya'o/ /gdan seng ge'i pad+mo bya'o/ /g.yon du lha mo sgrol ma'o/ /

g.yas su dkar mo ste/ me tog sna tshogs thogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta ba rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma la bzhugs pa/ 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs par bya'o/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rgyab tu rin po

che'i shing lcug phran dang / yal ga dang / chas pa rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras par bya'o/ /ne tso dang / ri skegs dang / shang shang te'u dang / rma bya dang / bya ka la ping ka rin po che'i gseb na rgyu bar bya'o/ /shing gi gong spyi bo la khang

bu rtseg ma dang bcas pa'i gzhal med khang gi nang du de bzhin gshegs pa gsum rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bzhugs par bya'o/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi g.yon du srin mo ral pa gcig ma bya'o/ /g.yas su lag na rdo rje khros pa'i gad mo 'byin

pa'i gzugs mche ba gtsigs pa skra gyen du brdzes pa/ lcang lo dang cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje thogs shing rdo rje gsor ba/ nam mkha' la blta bar bya'o/ /smad du gshin rje dang / chu lha dang / lus ngan po dang / gzhon nu dang /

rgyal po chen po bzhi bya'o/ /gong du dbang po dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa bya'o/ /g.yas phyogs su tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams btud de/ bcom

ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'o/ /g.yon du dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byad pa'o/ /g.yas kyi gnas gcig tu rig sngags 'chang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi zhabs drung du pus mo btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lta zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi sdong bu dang / pog phor dang / bgrang phreng lag na thogs pa bya'o/ /phyogs bzhi ngos kun du ris bskor ba la kyi tshogs sna tshogs

kyis gang ba/ shing sna tshogs me tog dang / lcug ma can bya'o/ /rdzing bu chu zags pa bya'o/ /'bras bu sna tshogs can gyi shing dang lcug ma bya'o/ /gnas so sor drang srong rnams dang / grul bum gyi shing bya'o/ /tshul de ltar don yod pa'i

lcags kyu ras la bris te/ gnas gtsang ma dben par bzhag la rig sngags 'chang bas 'bad pa chen pos mchod par bya'o/ /a ga ru dang / du ru ska dang / tsan+dan gyi bdug pa dbul bar bya'o/ /ci nus par don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig pa'i

rgyal po bzlas brjod bya'o/ /nyi ma re re ras la sku gzugs bris pa mthong ba tsam gyi mod la mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa'i sdig pa dang / sgrib pa dang / mnar med par gzhol ba dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba rnams yongs su dag cing zad par

'gyur ro/ /'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang / nad thams cad yongs su zad pa dang / rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/ /rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /dri ma dang bral

bar 'gyur ro/ /ser sna dang phrag dog dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /gzungs grub pa chen po so sor thob par 'gyur ro/ /mthong ba tsam gyi mod la de ma thag tu 'bras bu chen po rnyed pa rgya chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang log par

ltung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis rgyun du bsrung zhing rjes su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /ras kyi sku
