gzugs 'di'i 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba tsam gyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug zhal mngon du mthong ba dang 'dra bar rig par bya'o/ /gang zhig ras kyi sku gzugs 'di la legs par 'gyur ba'i tshul gyis bya ba

byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa de ni phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la mchod par 'gyur ro/ /

de nas rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na rab tu bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po chen po yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyir mi

ldog pa'i gnas thob par 'gyur ro/ /dge ba'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces

gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad grub par bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sems can gyi don dang / phan pa dang / bde bar bgyi ba'i phyir dang / sdig pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las yongs su grol

bar bgyi ba'i phyir don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po rim par phye ba rnams bstan pa lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das yang bdag la mchis pa ni don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad

kyi khro bo chen po'i las grub pa mchog tu 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / ma rungs pa brtson pa med pa/ brtse ba'i bsam pa med pa ni gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams

cad dang / 'byung po dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad thag 'jug pa/ ma rungs pa'i bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad rab tu dul

bar mdzad pa/ bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba dang / phung bar byed pa/ sems can ma rungs pa thams cad skrag par byed pa/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad 'ching ba dang / gcod pa dang / 'bigs

pa dang / rdung ba dang / gtor ba dang / lus rnam par zhig par byed pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'dir bdag gis pad+mo rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po cho ga zhib mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khor

mang po'i nang du don yod pa'i khro bo'i lcags kyu brjod par bgyi ste/ dkyil 'khor dang cho ga zhib mo thams cad du srung bar byed pa 'chos par byed pa/ dam tshig 'dzin pa gnas thams cad la rjes su skyong ba ste/ de ni sgrub par byed pa/ sgrub pa 'grub

par byed pa'i mchog de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs brtse ba chen po'i slad du bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen po byin gyis brlab cing rjes su gnang ba mdzod cig dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu 'grub pa'i snying po dag sems can thams

cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyas btab ste/ ngas kyang byin gyis brlabs so/ /sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang phyag rgyas btab cing

byin gyis brlabs kyis smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad gsang ba pa lag na rdo rje dang / rdo rje 'chang ba dang / rdo rje'i snying po thams cad dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri

za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba smros shig /spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i go skabs dang /

mchog grub par byos shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas bsgo zhing dbugs phyung ba thos nas snying dga'/ smin ma bskums/ dpral ba phyed khros par

byas/ gdong khro gnyer du byas/ mche ba ni gtsigs/ spyan ras gzigs kyi lus 'khor mang po'i nang du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas don yod pa'i zhags pa khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras pa/ dus gsum na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin

gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa rdo rje 'chang ba dang / dkyil 'khor chen po'i lha rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i rang sangs rgyas

dang / 'phags pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par song ba rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sha ra dwa ti'i bu blo gros can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /drang srong chen

po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum pa'i bdag po nag po chen po ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de

bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khro bo'i rgyal po rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ o~M bi kr-i ta/ ba da na/ ma hA kro d+ha rA dzA b+ha yaM ka ra/ ma hA daMSh+Ta/ aT+TaT+Ta hA sa/ dz+wa la dz+wa la ma hA dz+wa la/ mA la ma ha rau dra/ rU pa b+ha yaM ka ran/ ha na ha na/

sarba duSh+Ta/ yak+Sha/ rAk+Sha sA na/ da ha da ha/ sarba duSh+Ta/ nA gA nA na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sarba duSh+Ta/ big+h+naM bi nA ya kA na/ pA ta ya/ pA ta ya/ sarba duSh+Ta sa twA nAM/ b+ho b+ho ma hA kro d+ha rA dza/ ma Ni ka na ka/ badzra/ bai DUr+ya/ a lang kr-i ti/ sha

rI rA na/ badzra pa ra shu pA sha ha stA ya/ ma hA pad+ma ang ku sha /b+hu dzA ya/ ma hA pad+ma A sa nA ya/ ma hA pad+ma bi ka tsa gab+hA ya/ a mo g+ha a pra ti ha ta/ ba la pa rA kra mA ya/ sa ha sra/ bir+yA ya/ sarba b+hU ta/ b+ha yaM ka rA ya/ sarba

de ba b+ha ba na/ kA ma pa uta b+ha bA ya/ ma hA bi kr-i ta/ ba da nA ya/ nA ra sing ha mu khA ya/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ badzra dz+wa la/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ma hA tsaN+Da/ be ga d+ha ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsa tsa ra/ ni sha tsi ra/ I shwa ra/ b+h+r-i ku TI mu kha/ hUM hUM

phaT/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa pra ra/ sarba pA pa/ kilbi Sha ha ra/ ma hA ma Ni/ te dza d+ha ra/ pad+ma ha sta/ o~M pad+ma ang ku sha b+hu dze/ ta rA ya/ man+t+ra ma ya/ bi g+hAM/ shA sa ya/ duSh+TA na nA sha ya/ sarba pA pA ba ra Na hU~M phaT swA hA/

pA sha ha stA ya swA hA/ pad+ma d+ha rA ya swA hA/ sa mA shwA sa kA ya swA hA/ a mo g+ha ba ra d+ha rA ya swA hA/ kro d+ha rA dza b+ha yaM ka rA ya swA hA/ brah+ma be Sha d+ha rA ya swA hA/ trai lo kya pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ya ma/ ba ru Na/ ku be ra/ na maH kr-i twa ya swA hA/ badzra

d+ha ra pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ ma hA kA la ma tr-i ga Na/ ban di ta/ pU dzi tA ya swA hA/ de ba ga Na/ ban d+hi twa ya swA hA/ nA ga A kar+ShA ya swA hA/ o~M b+ha ra b+ha ra/ b+hi ri b+hi ri/ b+hu ru b+hu ru/ sarba maN+Da la a d+hiSh+Thi ta sa ma ya swA hA/ sarba mu drA a d+hi Sh+Thi ta mu

drA yai swA hA/ o~M a mo g+ha ba ra de/ ma hA daMSh+T+rA/ aM ku sha badzre hU~M/ ma hA pad+ma/ A shwa sa d+ha ra na mo stu te a mo g+ha aM ku sha hU~M phaT swA hA/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs 'di smras pa dang / lha'i gnas dang bcas pa dang / ri rab dang bcas

pa'i rgya mtsho gnas dang bcas pa dang / gzhal med khang rnams kun tu 'gul lo/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /ma rungs pa'i klu dang / lha ma yin dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin

po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad dang / bdud la sogs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa dang / gdon ma rungs pa rnams kha bub tu 'gyel lo/ /ma rungs pa thams cad kyi khyim kun du tshig ste 'bar ba/ kun du 'bar/ rab

tu 'bar/ 'bar ba gcig tu gyur cing bsregs pa dang / ngu zhing 'gre ldog ste/ tshor ba drag po mi bzad pa chen po myong ngo / /lha thams cad shin tu 'khrugs shing skrag go/ /bdud kyi rigs rnams bred nas khas btags so/ /'jig

rten gsum gyi bdag po thams cad kun du 'khrugs so/ /rgya mtshor gnas pa'i klu dang / rgya mtsho'i klu chen po dga' bo dang / bsnyen dga' bo dag kyang kun du 'khrugs shing shin tu skrag ste snying 'dar ro/ /gzhan yang sa'i steng na klu stong phrag

brgya gnas pa dang / rgya mtsho'i chu'i nang gi klu gang dag dang / ril gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kun du 'khrugs skrag cing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur cing gdungs so/ /rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams gnas na 'dug na yang skrag

go/ /nag po chen po dang / tshogs chen po'i gtso bo dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis bskor ba de dag thams cad skrag cing snying 'dar ro/ /gnas la brten pa'i bdud kyi gnas rnams 'dar ro/ /'bar kun du 'bar te gnas dang bcas

par sreg go/ /de nas 'khor de'i nang gi lha dang / klu rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi steng rol nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog sna tshogs 'thor ro/ /lha rdzas kyi rgyan spud pa sna tshogs dang / chos gos kyi char ba 'bebs

so/ /mchod pa'i las byed cing tsan+dan gyi chu'i char pas sa la chag chag 'debs so/ /lha rdzas kyi gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dang / rin po che sna bdun rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed do/ /de nas gnod

sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po phyag na rdo rje lus 'bar zhing rdo rje gsor te/ shin tu 'gying bag tu seng ge'i 'gros kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas byang chub

sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i phreng ba bcom ldan 'das phyag na pad+ma la

phul te/ zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa 'di dbul longs spyod pa'i phyir dang / bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du thugs rje chen po bzhes su gsol/ gang gis bdag yun ring por

phan pa dang / bde bar 'gyur lags so/ /khro bo chen po'i yang chen po bshad cing gang dran pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/ /gang dag bdud ma rungs pa dang / gang dag klu ma rungs pa dang /

gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za ma rungs pa dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa rnams khyim dang bcas te/ lus kun du tshig cing rab tu 'bar nas kha bub tu 'gyel cing sreg go/ /shi la thug pa dang srog skams par

'gyur ba'i don yod pa'i lcags kyu khro bo'i rgyal po ni dus thams cad du mgo'i spyi bor blang bar bgyi'o/ /bcang ngo / /bsgom mo/ /mchod do/ /rgyas par bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang gang gi lag na khro bo'i rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur ba dang /

rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs kyi lag na thogs pa'am/

lus la thogs pa'am/ lta ba'am/ dri ba'am/ tha na khro bo'i rgyal po nyan pa tsam de yang bcom ldan 'das bdag gis khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /bsrung bar bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /bsam

pa dang / yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/ /grub pa chen po'i chen po rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren ma rungs pa thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /

rtag tu rjes su 'brang zhing bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / spra bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu dus thams cad du mthong ba rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel cing phun sum tshogs par yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /

lus la stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / gzi brjid bskyed cing bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi grogs bgyi'o/ /dgra thams cad so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gos

dang / spud pa dang / rgyan rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bu gcig pa 'dra bar rjes su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /dad pa dang / gus pas dus kun du mchog tu mos par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa

spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces khyod kyis khas blangs pa mchog tu bzang po byas pa 'di legs so legs so zhes smras te/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog

gi phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje la rjes su brtse ba'i phyir dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / dkyil 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyis yongs su

longs spyad pa'i phyir dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad dkyil 'khor gang yin pa

'dir 'dug cing dam tshig la gnas pa rnams yongs su longs spyad pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin du 'dug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gong du gtor ro/ /de nas phreng ba de nam mkha' de la gtor ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi dbu'i steng du zla ba yid du 'ong ba/ dri ma med pa'i me tog de khang bu brtsegs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa/ 'od 'tsher ba/ ka ba bzhi dang / sgo bzhi legs par rnam par 'byes pa/ gru bzhi lham pa/ chu zheng

shin tu rgya che ba/ shin tu nang yangs pa/ me tog ka da l+ya dag gis mdzes pa/ gzhal med khang sna tshogs yongs su gyur te gnas so/ /de dag byang chub sems dpa'i dbu'i steng thad kar yang de bzhin du zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog rin po che

sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa'i gzhal med khang du shin tu gnas so/ /de'i lag na rdo rje'i dbu'i steng gi thad kar yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs par shin tu gnas so/ /de 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang

phyug gi steng thog thag tu yang zla ba yid du 'ong ba'i dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa nor bu rin po che chen po sna tshogs kyis spras pa me tog ka da l+yas mdzes par byas te gnas so/ /khang bu brtsegs pa'i nye 'khor kun gshin rje dang / chu lha dang /

lus ngan po dang / dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang / dbang phyug dang / dbang phyug chen po lha'i bu dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po rnams lag na rnga yab thogs nas g.yob cing 'dug go/ /de dag kyang

'khor 'dus pa chen po mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas so/ /dkyil 'khor gyi rig pa'i rgyal po'i lha de dag thams cad kyang nam mkha' la zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma med pa'i me tog khang bu brtsegs pa'i phreng ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i

khang bu brtsegs pa'i nang na 'khod pa ni nyi ma dang zla ba spa ba bzhin dang / nam mkha' la zla ba nya ba ni rgyu skar dang / skar ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba spa ba bzhin du spa bar gnas so/ /me tog de dag gi nang na lha rdzas kyi zla ba yid du 'ong ba dri ma

med pa'i me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / puN+Da rI ka dang / man dA ra ba dang / ma hA man dA ra ba dang / me tog ro tsa dang / ma hA ro tsa dang / me tog sa la dang / tA la ka dang / me tog ta ma la dang / tsam

pa ka dang / me tog a d+hi mu ka ta dang / me tog a sho ka dang / me tog pa ta la dang / me tog nI la dang / ma hA nI la dang / me tog gan d+ha bar+Sha ka dang / me tog su man dang / ta ra Na dang / ku a ka'i me tog gi char gyi rgyun phab

bo/ /bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / dkyil 'khor chen po la mchod pa'i phyir dang / lha rdzas kyi chos gos spud pa dang rgyan sna tshogs kyi char ji srid du char 'bab cing phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod do/ /de ltar na cho 'phrul

che ba'i che ba dag snang ngo / /rol mo'i sgra yan lag lnga pa dag kyang ma brdungs par nam mkha' la sgra 'byung ngo // //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ de nas de

bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can dag pa chen po mchog tu dkon pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di smras te/

rig sngags 'chang thams cad mchog tu grub par bya ba'i phyir ma rungs pa thams cad 'joms pa/ sdig pa thams cad sreg pa bshad pa legs so legs so/ /'di ni phyi ma'i dus na rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis lan cig dran pa tsam gyis

dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur/ yid la re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur/ gnas thams cad gtogs pa'i grub pa chen po rab tu ston par 'gyur/

rig sngags 'chang ba rnams kyis yangs shing rgya che ba'i chen po thams cad byed par 'gyur/ phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na 'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa gcig po mchog 'grub par 'gyur te/ las grub pa yang dag par grub pa'i phyir ro/ /de nas

khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po gnod sbyin chen po stong phrag brgya'i bdag po stobs che ba/ dpung che ba brtan zhing pha rol gnon pa chen po gang gis lag mthil gcig gis ri'i rgyal po lhun po chen po 'gul bar byed

pa lha'i gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas te/ rgya mtsho chen po na gnas te/ 'khor bye ba phal po che dang ldan pa/ drag po gzi brjid drag po stobs che ba/ pha rol gyi dpung 'joms par byed pa de stan las langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba

de logs su song ste nye bar phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang

chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po shin tu mi bzad pa'i gsang sngags bshad pas ni bcom ldan 'das gzhal med khang dang bcas pa bsregs so/ /

gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag bye ba khrag khrig 'khor dang bcas pa 'bar ba gcig tu gyur te bsregs so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag ni zhigs te tshig cing zhu bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ bdag la
skyob pa su lags/ dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba su lags/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni srog rnam par zhig go/ /dus kyi zhags pas bcings so/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag la phan gdags su gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa

bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po khyod ma 'jigs par khro

po'i rgyal po lcags kyu'i dkyil 'khor gyi rjes su song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la skyabs su nye bar song shig /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug 'di ni khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen dang / skyob pa dang / rten du 'gyur te/ gang gis 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin stong phrag brgya'i srog dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba yin no/ /kye gnod sbyin chen

po myur ba myur bar song ste skyabs su 'gro bar byos shig /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs gtsug phud 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs phyung ba rtogs nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs

dbang phyug ga la ba de logs su song ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la ngu zhing brgyal nas lag pa brkyang ste zhabs la btud nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag bskyab tu

gsol/ thugs rje chen po bdag bskyab tu gsol/ bdag la srog stsal bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bsregs shing gcig tu 'bar bar gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin du ma stong phrag brgya bye ba 'khor dang bcas

pa srog dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/ /shes pa ni stor/ stobs dang brtson 'grus spro bar byed pa ni nyams na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lus su zhig gso bar bgyid/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khros

pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /kye gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyon cig /nga ji srid ston gyi bar du yud tsam zhig sdod cig /gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khyod kyis

'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can mang po la rnam par gtse bar byas/ khyod kyis bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po ni zos na khyod kyis 'phags pa'i spyan mang po ni nyams par byas/ khyod kyis rig sngags dang / dkyil 'khor

dang / cho ga zhib mo mang po'i bar chad ni byas/ grub pa rnams ni med par byas/ ma grub pa rnams kyang med par byas/ skal ba can mang po ni med par byas/ skal ba med pa ni yod par byas/ mi 'tshe ba dang / srog dang longs spyod kyi

bde ba ni med par byas/ 'tshe ba dang srog rnam par 'jig pa ni 'phel bar byas/ khyod kyis legs par bshad pa ni yongs su bor/ khyod kyis nyes par bshad pa dang / ser sna ni mang du byas/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang / sems

can thams cad la khyod nag po dang / rnam par 'jig par rab tu gnas/ khyod kyis ngan sems thams cad ni spel/ khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ni nub par byas/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na khyod shin tu mi bzad pa sdig pa can yin/ gshin

rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas dang bcas/ bdud dang bcas/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i nang na khyod gcig pu ngan sems can bar chad byed par skyes pa yin te/ rgyu des na gnas skabs 'di 'dra ba thob pa yin pas kye gnod sbyin gyi bdag po dam tshig dang / bslab

pa dang / sdom pa khas blang ba dang / dge ba'i chos byos shig /'on kyang kho bo khyod kyi skyabs dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar bya'o/ /khyod sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa dang / bcings pa mi bzad pa dang / me 'bar ba mi bzad pa'i 'jigs

pa las ngas yongs su thar bar bya'o/ /mtho ris kyi lam du 'jug par bya'o/ /de nas khros pa'i gad rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi zhabs gnyis la btud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod kyi bka' lung bzhin bgyis te dam tshig la gnas par bgyi'o/ /chos kyi rjes su sems pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchis pa la gnas par bgyi'o/ /khro bo'i rgyal po

'di dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal po lcags kyu'i gzungs dang / cho ga zhib mo dang / gang yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /don yod

pa'i lcags kyu'i gzungs rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'don pa dang / bzlas brjod kyi cho ga kun spyod pa de la ni bdag gnod sbyin brgya stong du ma rnams kyis 'og dang / bla dang / phyogs bzhi kun du bsod nams su

dmigs te/ bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab par bgyi'o/ /yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /lus la stobs dang / spro ba dang / gzi byin mang du bskyed par bgyi'o/ /de'i yul phyogs su 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang

'dru ba dang / ma legs pa dang / lo nyes dang / mi ngas dang / rims dang / gnod pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / nyam thag par byed pa'i gdon dang bcas pa dang / nad dang / gcong dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/ /rab tu

bsal bar bgyi'o/ /rkun po dang / zol po dang / mi rgod dang / gcan gzan khro bo'i 'jigs pa rnams bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa las so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /rmi lam ngan pa dang / ltas ngan pa dang /

bkra mi shis pa byung ba thams cad so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /char ches pa dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / sad dang / than pa dang / byi ba'i 'jigs pa rnams so sor bsal bar bgyi'o/ /dben pa dang / nyams dga' ba dang / lo

legs pa dang / 'byor pa sbyar bar bgyi'o/ /sems can mi dge ba spyod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /dge ba la sbyor bar bgyi'o/ /sems can dge ba spyod pa rnams kyi grogs bdag 'khor dang bcas pas bgyi'o/ /yang dag par dad pas rjes su 'brang bar

bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / sems can thams cad bu gcig pa bzhin du yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /chos la zhugs pa'i yid dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pas gnas

par bgyi'o/ /thams cad du bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/ /ji ltar rang gi srog 'di yongs su bskyang ba bzhin du gzungs dang / rig sngags grub pa 'di yang yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o/ /spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /khur du bkur bar bgyi'o/ /sgrub par 'grub pa

chen po stsal bar bgyi'o/ /bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / gnod sbyin chad pas so sor bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis khro bo'i gad

rgyangs spyi gtsug 'bar ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po legs so legs so/ /khyod kyis de bzhin du bya bar rigs so/ /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba chen pos gzung bar bya'o/ /rig sngags 'chang

ba la bdag nyid kyis bsrung ba dang / bcang bar bya'o/ /de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po de skyabs gsum la gnas shing dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa'i tshig 'dzin pa la gnas par gyur to/ /rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig dang

ldan par gyur to/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /yon tan gyi phung po mchog tu bzang ba la gnod sbyin gyi bdag po khas

len du bcug cing bzhag pa legs so legs so/ /khro bo'i rgyal po'i cho ga nye bar spyad pa de smros shig /rig sngags 'chang de rnams ji ltar mchog 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig dran pa tsam gyis ji lta ji ltar myur ba myur bar las sgrub pa 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / ji

ltar dran pa tsam gyis ji ltar bsams pa dang / yid la re ba 'byor par 'gyur ba dang / don yod pa'i lcags kyu'i khro bo'i rgyal po 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ba de ltar byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis rlobs shig /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags

pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' lung stsal ba rtogs nas nye bar bshad pa'i cho ga smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang ba/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang yin pa'am/ gzhan dge sbyong dang /

bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / rje'u rigs dang / dmangs rigs dang / bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams khro bo'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub par 'dod na/ de zla ba yar gyi ngo'i tshes lnga la 'bras chan dang / 'o ma za zhing nang par sngar langs la 'phags pa spyan ras

gzigs dbang phyug gi sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas mi smra bar gaN+DI brdung ba'i dus la bab kyi bar du 'bras chan khyor ba bkang ste/ gtor ma brgya rtsa brgyad dbul ba byas na/ des khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub pa'i cho ga de dag 'grub par 'gyur zhing mchog tu 'grub

par 'gyur ro/ /de ltar bsgrubs nas de nas bzlas brjod gcig dang / dran pa gcig gis thams cad du 'grub par byas na thams cad du bya ba thams cad mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang ba las byed par 'dod cing / don yod

pa'i zhags pa'i snying po sgrub par 'dod na khro bo'i rgyal po lan cig dran par bya'o/ /dran pa tsam gyi mod la bgegs dang / log 'dren thams cad skrag par 'gyur zhing dpag tshad tshun chad du rig sngags 'chang ba'i drung du 'ong bar mi nus te/ rgyang ring po ring po na 'dug go/ /'di lan cig

dran pa tsam gyis bzlas brjod dang / cho ga dang / sgrub pa bde bar 'grub cing dgos pa sgrub pa thams cad grub pa bla na med pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug mchog sbyin pa mdzad par 'gyur ro/ /dpag tshad tshun chad du 'bar ba'i lcags kyu chen po

'phang du ri chen po tsam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad tsam dang / 'og tu g.yang sar gyur te/ su yang 'ong mi nus so/ /lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi

ma yin pa dang bcas pas gnas der 'ong bar mi nus na/ mi ma yin pa phal pa dang / bgegs dag log 'dren rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te gnas med do/ /rig sngags 'chang ba 'jigs pa med par yang dgos pa thams cad grub pa sgrub par byed do/ /bgegs med par

thams cad du sgrub pa 'grub pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang las thams cad bya bar 'dod cing gdon bsal bar 'dod na/ gu gul dang / yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ gdon la bdug pa sbyin par bya'o/ /yungs kar gyis brdeg par bya'o/ /lan

cig dran par bya'o/ /lag pa g.yas pa'i mdzub mos khros pas bsdigs par bya'o/ /bdug pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dran pa lhan cig tu byas na mod la gdon thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /ji ste nag po chen po rang nyid dam/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'am/ sgra gcan

nam/ 'jigs byed kyang 'jig par byed na/ gdon gzhan 'ong bar lta ga la 'gyur te/ mod la gcig tu 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gdon gyis yongs su zin pa thams cad la dur khrod kyi thal ba la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ spyi bor gtor zhing lan cig

dran par byas na/ mod la 'byung po dang gdon 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /na la da dang / an da ni dra ka pa tsa dang / gu gul dang / ha sa dang / ba la ka dang / ma tu la dang / pad+ma dang / puSh+pa rnam gnyis dang / ra dza ni dang / yungs kar dang / shing kun dang / na ra pad+ma dang /

bi sha ra dang / tsan dri ka rnams ra'i gcin gyis sbrus te/ ril bu nas kyi 'dzel ma tsam byas te/ grib ma la bskams la/ lcags kyu lan bdun bzlas pa byas nas las thams cad la bdug pa mchog gi ril bu gcig bdug pa byas na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig

rten gyi khams ri dang nags tshal dang / gcong rong dang bcas pa rnams 'gul lo/ /rgya mtsho chen po ni 'khrugs so/ /ri rab chen po ni g.yos so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas gzhal med khang dang bcas pa ni cher g.yos te 'gul lo/ /lha thams cad skrag go/ /lha ma

yin thams cad ngu zhing phyogs phyogs su 'bros so/ /sa ni g.yos so/ /klu gang dag rgya mtsho na gnas pa dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / dang / brjed byed dang / gsang ba pa dang / tshangs pa'i srin po dang / bgegs dang / gdon mi bzad pa gzhan

ma rungs pa de dag thams cad dri tshor ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /lus rnam par zhig par 'gyur/ bcom ste rus pa lhags par 'gyur/ 'chi bdag gi zhags pa'i khar 'gro bar 'gyur/ des rnam par zhig par 'gyur ba de la dogs par

mi bya'o/ /dug dang bcas pa ni mod la dug med par 'gyur ro/ /klu 'jog po dang / nor rgyas kyis gal te zin pa'am/ sbrul gyis zin pa la bdug pa dang / byugs pa tsam gyis thams cad du dug med par 'gyur ro/ /gang dag 'jig rten na

dug sna tshogs mi bzad pa yod pa la bdug pa'i dri tsam dang bskus pa dang / ril bu tsam gyi mod la dug thams cad med par 'gyur te/ the tshom mi bya'o/ /'bras dang / phol mig dang / lu ta dang / shu ba dang / sha ba kra dang / rkang shu dang / mdze dang /

'brum bu dang / lhog pa rnam pa mang po dang / nad mched pa dang / lba ba'i phreng ba dang / khong 'bras dang / rkub na ba dang / skran dang / 'khru ba dang / rtsib logs na ba dang / snying ga na ba dang / gre ba 'gags pa dang / rna ba na ba dang / so na ba dang / mig na ba dang /

mgo bo na ba dang / gzhogs phyed na ba la ril bus bskus pa tsam dang / chu dron 'thungs pa tsam dang / bdug pa tsam dang / mnams pa tsam gyis thams cad de ma thag tu rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ thams cad la ril bu dam pa lan cig bzlas brjod byas te byin na thams cad du

dgos pa thams cad byed pa bla na med pa yin no/ /shin tu char che ba dang / char mi 'bab pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char dang / rlung dang / ser ba dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo'i gnas dang / mtsho klu de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /char dus su 'bebs so/ /lo

tog dang / 'bras bu dang / me tog yod par 'gyur ro/ /phyis ser ba mi 'bab bo/ /sad dang rlung dang than pa mi 'gyur ro/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad grub par byed cing bkra shis pa thams cad grub par byed do/ /rims drag po ma rungs pa kun tu 'jug pa'i rims

mi bzad pa dang / 'das pa mi bzad pa drag po'i rims dang / rims drag po'i 'jigs pa chen po dang / me 'bar ba shin tu che ba dang / zhag bzhi pa'i rims mi bzad pa dang / grang ba'i rims sdug bsngal che ba dang / rims gang dag 'chi ba'i zhags pa

'bar ba/ 'khrug pa drag po mi bzad pa dang / zlos pa'i rims gso dka' ba dang / nyin gcig pa'i rims dang / nyin gnyis pa'i rims dang / nyin gsum pa'i rims dang / de bzhin du rlung las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / mkhris pa

las gyur pa dang / mchil ma las gyur pa'i rims dang / rims rnying pa dang / zug gzer dang / gzhang 'brum dang / gcin snyi ba mi bzad pa dang / rims thams cad la bdug pa tsam gyis the tshom med par rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro/ /nam mkha'

lding gi gdon dang / gang dag mi'am ci'i gdon dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang / mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang / gang dag gzhan mi'i gdon thams cad bdug pa bdugs pa des mod la thams cad rnam par bral bar 'gyur ro/ /lcags kyu'i gsang sngags

dam pa lan cig dran par byas na/ skem byed dang / skams pa dang / brjed byed dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mA dang / bdag nyid ngan par byung ba dang / grib gnon dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa gang du skye bo zhe sdang ba rnams 'byung ba dang / gang du gnod pa dang /

'khrug pa dang / nyon mongs pa mang po rnams la yid du 'ong ba bdugs pa tsam gyis thams cad las de thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po khros pa dang / gang zhig rkun po dang / mi rgod kyi nang du song ngam/ gcong rong bgrod dka' ba'i nang du song ngam/ dogs pa mi

bzad pa'i nang du chud pa la lcags kyu lan cig dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du rtag tu bde bar 'gro ba dang / gang dang gang du 'gro ba na bde bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mes mi tshugs/ chu chen pos khyer bar mi 'gyur ro/ /lcags

kyu'i rig sngags dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs na thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang bde zhing legs pa shin tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/ /de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis ma yin/ gsang sngags mchog tu drag pos ma yin/ de la

byad kyis mi tshugs/ nad kyis ma yin/ nyon mongs pa drag pos ma yin no/ /gsang sngags dran pa tsam dang / bdug pas bdag bdug pa ni thams cad du 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur te/ 'di la dogs pa mi bya'o/ /dgra dang phyir rgol ba'i

mi sems can ma rungs pa mi bzad pa rnams dang / 'thab mo 'gyed cing g.yul 'gyed pa na bdag nyid bdug pas bdug cing rig sngags lan cig dran par byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur te/ mthong ba tsam la dogs par mi bya'o/ /gang zhig rig sngags

'grub par mi 'gyur ba dang / gang zhig bgegs kyis zin te nyams pa dang / blo zhan cing le lo can la bdug pa 'di sbyar bar bya zhing gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas na des mchog tu dkon pa 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /skal ba med pa bdag nyid bdug pa dang /

ril bu mchog gis bkru ba dang / mig bsku ba dang / mchog thig le byas na thams cad du skal ba can dang / dga' ba dang / dbang phyug mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/ /nor dang 'bru 'phel zhing rgyal po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du stobs thogs pa med

par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchog grub pa dang / rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dus thams cad du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang zhing gnas par 'gyur ro/ /bsrung ba'i phyir rgyal po chen

po bzhi dpung 'khor dang bcas pa rig sngags kyi rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /bde ba thams cad kyis tshim par thob par 'gyur ro/ /gnas gcig nas ril bu bdun blangs pa las khro bo'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bya'o/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang

ba'am/ gzhan gang yang rung ba nas dge sbyong dang / bram ze bkren pa sdug phongs pa'i bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ khye'u'am/ bu mo'i don du ril bu gcig gis khrus bya/ gcig gis bdag bdug /gcig gis gos bdug /gcig ni ba'i rnam lnga dang sbyar te

btung bar bya/ gcig ni mgo'i spyi bor gzhag /gcig ni dpung pa g.yas par gdags/ ril bu gcig ni rked par btags na thams cad du 'byor pa thob par 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchog bla na med pa 'grub par 'gyur/ bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/ rgud pa

thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur ro/ /rma dang / nyam chung ba dang / de bzhin du chag grugs dang / bgegs kyis zin pa dang / gdon ra za yag sh+mAs zin pa de dag thams cad rab tu sbyar ba tsam gyis rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ dogs par mi bya'o/ /sgrib pa

thams cad rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ sngon bsags pa'i sgrib pa thams cad mod la rnam par zhig par 'gyur te/ gsang sngags bsten pa dang / gsang sngags dran cing dran pa dang / bdug pa mchog gis bdugs par byas pas dogs par mi bya'o/ /mnar med pa

dang / mi bzad pa'i sdig pa dang / dug dang / sems can ma rungs pa dang / las ngan pa dang / phung ba rnams thams cad mod la med par 'gyur ro/ /mes phye ma leb bzhin rtag tu myur du sreg par 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags lan cig dran par bya zhing bdug pa 'dis

bdug sa na dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad zhig par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du sbyar ba la dogs par mi bya'o/ /'khor los sgyur ba thams cad kyi khro bo'i lcags kyu spyi gtsug 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal pos khyim dang / sgo chen por nam nangs ka dang / mun sros kar

bdug cang gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas na/ khyim gyi nang der gang dag mi snang bar 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za dang / brjed byed dang / grib gnon ma rungs pa dang / mi ma yin pa thams cad snang bzhin du phyir 'byung

zhing ngus te/ kyi hud zer ba'i sgra 'byin par 'gyur ro/ /khyim gang yin pa 'gul ba dang / khyim dang rta babs rnams 'bab par 'gyur zhing dmyal ba'i srung ma mi bzad pa thams cad phyogs bslad par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / lha

ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / klu mthu bo che thams cad bdug pa'i dri bla na med pas skrag par 'gyur ro/ /bsam pa ngan pa gang dag gnas pa'i khyim thams cad 'bar ba dang / lus bsregs pa dang / phyogs dang / phyogs

mtshams 'khrul ba dang / bdug pa'i rgyal po'i mthus 'jigs pa mi bzad pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /g.yul 'gyed pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab cing 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing rtag tu rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /

bde zhing legs par rgyal ba 'grub pa dang / thams cad du dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha dang / lha ma yin dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / klu rnams kyis bsrung ba'i phyir nyin mtshan du rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du rjes su skyong ba dang / dus thams

cad bla na med pa'i gzi byin skyed par byed do/ /khro bo lcags kyu bla na med pa grub pa'i thig le brjod par bya'o/ /thig le skar ma lta bu ni/ /lha yi nyi ma bzhin du dpa'/ /nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mtshungs/ /bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis 'bar/ /mun khrod sgron chen 'od bzhin du/ /

mun pa'i nang na snang bar 'gyur/ /tshogs kyi dkyil na mdzes pa ni/ /skar ma'i tshogs ldan zla ba bzhin/ /bsod nams bye ba stong phrag dang / /dpag med gzhal du med pa yis/ /lus 'di dag ni brgyan par 'gyur/ /mkha' la rin chen mchod sdong ltar/ /mtshan dang dpe byad

bzang pos brgyan/ /ril bu bsten pa byas na ni/ /lus ni bsod nams tshogs kyis bskyed/ /gang zhig lus ni 'bar ba dang / /shin tu bzang po kho nar 'gyur/ /'jig rten mgon po dus rtag tu/ /phyag ni spyi bor 'jog par mdzad/ /rtag tu mchog ni sbyin pa dang / /kun tu bla

med grub par 'gyur/ /cho ga zhib mo 'grub pa dang / /gsang sngags 'grub cing phyag rgya dang / /dkyil 'khor 'grub cing dkyil 'khor gyi/ /rim par phye ba 'grub 'gyur te/ /kun du 'grub pa bla na med/ /gi'u wang dang / gur gum dang / ru rta cha bsnyams te sbyar la khro bo'i

lcags kyu'i gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tshangs par spyod pa mnyam par gzhag pa/ khrus legs par byas pa/ gos gtsang ma bgos shing gtsang mas zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes bcu gsum skar ma rgyal la bab pa'i tshe chu gtsang ma dang zhib tu btags la rgya shug

gi 'bru tsam byas te grib ma la bskams la/ gang gi tshe dgos pa rtsom pa de'i/ khro bo'i rgyal po'i lcags kyu lan nyi shu rtsa gnyis bzlas brjod byas te smin mtshams su thig le bya'o/ /smin mtshams su thig le bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs

kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mtshan nyid bzhin du thig le byas te byin gyis brlabs pa byas pa'i mod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi mtshan nyid rnam par mdzes pa'i thig le dang mnyam par mtshungs par brgyan par 'gyur ro/ /thams cad du mchod par bya ba dang /

rtag tu bla ma la gus pas dam tshig mnyams pa dang / rgyal po dang mtshungs pa'i blon po dang / btsun mo'i nang du song na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur zhing thams cad du mchod par 'os par 'gyur ro/ /sems can kun gus pa dang / dga' ba ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa

la bya ba bzhin byed do/ /nor dang / 'bru dang / lha'i dpal thob par 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ /dbang po dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / 'jig rten skyong ba grags chen dang / klu rnams kyis rtag tu mchod par

'os pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / gsang ba pa dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / tshe 'phel bar 'gyur

ro/ /nad med pa dang / rims nad med pa dang / sdig pa thams cad spangs pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang / sdig pa dang / dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa'i nang du rtag tu thams cad

du rgyal bar sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /dgra dang / phyir rgol ba rnams las gnas thams cad du rtag tu kun du rgyal ba chen po sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /thig le de lta bu byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu lan cig dran par byas la yungs kar la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te phug gi sgor

gtor na phug thams cad sgo gdangs par 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar dga' bar 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /lan gsum zhugs kyi bar du sgo gtan 'jug pa'i gnas su khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig bzlas brjod byas na de'i tshe lha'i bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan

pa bzang zhing mdzes pa blta bar 'os pa mchog tu mdog sdug cing 'phrig pa dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis shin tu dpa' zhing 'bar ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ lus ngo tsha tsha ltar byed pa/ 'gros 'gying bag tu 'ong bar 'gyur te/ spyi bo yid tsam btud nas gser gyi snod rin

po ches bkang ba thogs te rig sngags 'chang la 'bul bar byed do/ /rig sngags 'chang bas cang mi smra bar bya'o/ /rin po che'i snod kyang blang bar mi bya'o/ /gsang sngags 'ba' zhig dran par bya zhing yungs kar gyis gzhon nu ma la brdeg par bya'o/ /ci ste gzhon nu ma de

rtug pa 'byin cing bzhin bsgyur ba khro bo'i gzugs mchu 'phyang ba/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ skra ral pa ser la gyen du brdzes la ral pa cod pan gyis brgyan par ston na rig sngags 'chang bas skrag par mi bya'o/ /khro bo'i lcags kyu 'ba' zhig dran par bya'o/ /yang yungs

kar gyis mgo'i spyi bor brdeg cing khros pa'i gzugs kyis dran par byas na/ de'i tshe de sa la 'gyel te 'gre ldog cing kye rig sngags 'chang thugs rje can khyod rig sngags 'chang khyab 'jug gi gzugs can gum mo gum mo zhes sgra 'byin to/ /de nas rig sngags 'chang

bas rjes su brtags te/ gal te kha chu dbu bar byung na/ rig sngags 'chang bas de blangs la rkang pa dang byin pa bskus na rlung gi phung bo bdun pa'i rlung la zhon te nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags

'chang ba'i 'khor brgya phrag bye ba dgu bcu rtsa dgus bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /skad cig tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mthar song zhing slar yang 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /gal te reg na ni skyes nas lo bcu drug lon pa dang 'dra zhing skra yid tsam 'khyil zhing 'khyil

ba/ rna cha gdu bu dri ma med cing spen tog 'phyang ba dang / mkhrig ma gdu bus brgyan pa/ lus pad+ma 'dra zhing dkar sham du 'gyur ro/ /tshe bskal pa stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis thub par 'gyur ro/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa

gnyis kyi 'khor gyis bskor bar 'gyur ro/ /gnas thams cad du dpon por 'gyur ro/ /gal te thig le byas te mi snang bar gyur na gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po thams cad kyi khyim sgo phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung

po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad bgyi ba ci mchis zhes dbang du 'gyur zhing bka' bzhin du 'dug go/ /mngags pa'i dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/ /khyim thams cad du re rer yang dpon po dang / bka' bzhin byed pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/ /gal

te mtshog mar thig le byas na brgya byin dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi bdag po'i lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris kyi lha'i bu dang bcas pa thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang ba la bya ba thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur

byed par 'gyur ro/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha'i rigs kyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' kun du spyod par 'gyur ro/ /tshe lha'i lo stong legs par thob par 'gyur ro/ /lte ba'i gnas su thig le byas te klu mtshor zhugs pa tsam gyi mod la klu'i rgyal po dpung dang

g.yog tu bcas chung ma dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma'am/ thams cad mdun na 'dug cing 'di skad smra ste/ rig sngags 'chang ba bka' stsol cig dang / las bgyi ba dang / dgos pa thams cad bgyi zhing nam 'tsho'i bar du nye bar gnas par bgyi'o/ /yo byad

thams cad kyis mi brel bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /klu'i lha'i longs spyod mchog tu longs spyad pas brtse bar bgyi'o/ /lha'i lo stong gi bar du rjes su gnas par bgyi'o/ /nor thams cad rjes su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs gser dang /

dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shang ka shi la dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / in+d+ra nI la dang / mar ka ta dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / baiDUr+ya dang / shin tu bzang po rnams su stsal bar bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi bza' ba mchog

dang / lha rdzas kyi nor gyi phung pos bang mdzod rnams rab tu dgang bar bgyi'o/ /shin tu char ches pa gcad par bgyi'o/ /char dkon pa na char dbab par bgyi'o/ /dus ma yin pa'i char gcad par bgyi'o/ /dus su char dbab pa dang / dus su char ba'i rgyun 'byung bar

bgyi'o/ /lha rdzas kyi me tog sna tshogs dang / lha rdzas kyi 'bras bu sna tshogs nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du gnas te bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa spyi bos blang bar bgyi'o/ /rig sngags 'chang ba de'i tshig dang bsam pa rjes su bskyang

bar bgyi'o/ /dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du thig le byas na glang po che stong gi stobs yod par 'gyur te/ phyir rgol ba dang / dgra thams cad kyi stobs kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro/ /'thab cing dmag gi g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad kyi nang du pha rol gnon pa'i stobs thogs pa

med pa rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lha ma yin kun las kyang rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /lha thams cad 'di la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyang ba'i phyir rtag tu zham ring du 'brang bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / dngogs 'byin pa dang / mtshang

'dru ba dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad du rgyal ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lto bar thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu'i rig sngags lan cig dran par byas la yid la ji ltar bsams pa ji bzhin byas na ci 'dod pa'i kha zas thob par 'gyur te/ 'khor nyi shu dang bcas pas

ji ltar 'dod pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /sker thig le byas te khro bo'i lcags kyu sker lan cig bzlas brjod byed cing rgyal po'i pho brang du song na ji tsam 'dod pa'i gos dang / spud pa dang / rgyan thob par 'gyur ro/ /rtag tu rgyal po dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pas mchod

par bya bar 'os pa'i mchog tu 'gyur ro/ /dbang phyug chen po'i chen po thob pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lag mthil du thig le byas te lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la reg pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/ /gang 'dod pa de thams cad sbyin zhing bsgo ba de thams cad byed par

'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la bskus la lan cig bzlas brjod byas te/ grong khyer gyi sgo la brdabs na grong khyer na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ mdun na gnas shing de thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ /grong de na

skye bo gang dag gnas pa bud med dang / skyes pa dang / khye'u dang / bu mo de thams cad dbang du 'gyur te/ 'dug cing ji srid grong khyer der 'dug par 'dod pas de srid du thams cad ci bya ba thams cad byed cing gnas pa dang mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /lag

pa g.yon pa la bskus te/ rgyal po'i sgo la brdabs na ji srid 'dug par 'dod na de srid du thams cad dbang du gyur pa sbyin par 'gyur ro/ /lag pa g.yas pa la bsku zhing lan cig bzlas brjod bya ste/ phug gi gsang ba'i sgo la brdab pa byas na gsang ba'i khyim

thams cad sgo phye ste 'dug cing khyim na gnas pa de dag thams cad dbang du gyur te 'dug go/ /rkang pa gnyis la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan cig dran par byas te dur khrod na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / sha za thams cad mdun

na gnas shing dbang 'gyur ba dang / khyim gyi sgo thams cad phye ba dang / thams cad bya ba ci yod pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /brla gnyis la bskus te nags tshal gyi nang du zhugs na zhugs pa tsam gyis khyim na gnas pa thams cad mdun na gnas shing khyim gyi sgo thams

cad phye ste 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /sman gyi rdzas thams cad dang / rtswa dang / shing gel ba'i sman dang / rtswa dang mgo lcogs kyi nags tshal gyi rang gi ngo bo thams cad ji ltar 'dod pa blangs pa bzhin du mdun na 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /dpal lha mo chen mo'i

nu ma'i bar du bsku zhing khros pas gsang sngags lan cig bzlas brjod byas shing gu gul la bzlas brjod byas te/ bdug pa dbul zhing mig mi 'dzums par bltas na dpal ldan lha mo chen mo bka' stsol cing mchog thams cad sbyin par byed do/ /nor shin

tu mang po rnyed pa sbyin par mdzad de/ dpal lha mo chen mo rtag tu khyim na gnas par 'gyur ro/ /yo byad thams cad kyis yongs su skyong bar 'gyur ro/ /nam 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro/ /mi'i 'o ma dang lhan cig tu bdar la lan cig bzlas brjod

byas te mig la bskus na gter thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshan mo'ang nyin par bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /mchu'i thor to la thig le bya zhing lan cig bzlas brjod byas na gang la smra ba de dbang du 'gyur zhing gang 'dod pa de thams cad thob par 'gyur

ro/ /tshig gzung bar bya bar 'gyur ro/ /kha nas ut+pa la'i dri mnam par 'gyur ro/ /gdon la thig le byas na zin pa dang / ma zin pa 'bab par 'gyur ro /gdon thams cad la thig le bya zhing lan cig gsang sngags dran par byas na mod la tshangs

pa'i srin po la sogs pa'i bar du thams cad ngu zhing 'bros par 'gyur ro/ /thig le tsam dang dran pa tsam gyis thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /'jigs pa thams cad la thig le byas na yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /phrag pa gnyis la

thig le bya zhing khro bo lan cig dran par byas na phrag pa gnyis 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /mtshal dang sbyar te dri chab dang bsres nas lag pa dang rkang pa la bsku zhing gsang sngags lan bdun dran par byas nas phu zhes byas na me 'bar bar 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod kyi

bar du 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /mchu la bsku zhing bzlas brjod byas na dbugs rgyu ba rnams me 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /lus mtha' dag bsku zhing gsang sngags mang du bzlas brjod byas na lus mtha' dag 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /chu dang yungs kar

gyis bskrad nas bum pa dang / bum pa la zhi ba'i thig le byas te/ dri chus steng du gtor ba dang bcas pa byas na phyir yang gnas par 'gyur ro/ /ral gri dang / gtun shing dang / dgra sta dang / 'khor lo dang / mdung rtse gsum dang / rdo rje dang / tho ba dang /

mda' bo che dang / mdung la bsku zhing rjes su dran par byas na skad cig tu thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /lhung bzed la bskus na 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /mgo la bskus na skra 'bar bar 'gyur ro/ /dung la bskus te de gnas mthon por bus na sgra gang thos pa tsam

gyis sems can thams cad kyi khro ba thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /ngan pa dang / ma rungs pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /sprin logs su bus na rlung sprin dang / ser ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /grong khyer gyi sgo bzhir

bus na/ byur dang gnod pa thams cad dang / lo nyes dang / nad ma rungs pa dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /'byung po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po

dang / sha za dang / dang / skem byed dang / grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rims thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /gsang sngags dang / byad dang / sbod gtong dang / dug gi

'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ro/ /rgyal po'i sgor bus na pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyi 'jigs pa thams cad dang / dgra dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur zhing lan 'ga' yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /ba

lang 'chi ba dang / phyugs 'chi ba dang / mi 'chi ba dang / rta 'chi ba dang / glang po che 'chi ba dang / rnga mo 'chi ba dang / byur dang / lo nyes dang / nad dang / mig nad dang / nad thams cad kyi 'jigs pa chen po 'byung ba la khang pa'i steng du skad drag po lan cig dung

sgra bud cing bzlas brjod byas na/ bus pa tsam gyi mod la thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /char mi 'bab pa'i tshe/ klu'i gnas mtsho 'gram du bus na mod la klu'i rgyal po rnams char pa'i rgyun gtong bar 'gyur ro/ /char ches pa'i tshe sprin logs su

bus na shin tu char che ba zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan 'ga' yang mtshan ma ngan pa dang / bkra mi shis pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /mtshams chen po gcad na ri mthon po'i khar bus te/ ji tsam dung sgra thos pa de tsam tshun chad mtshams chen po gcad par byas par 'gyur ro/ /

dkyil 'khor mtshams gcad na bskor zhing bus na dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams gcad pa byas par 'gyur ro/ /de nas khro bo'i rgyal po'i sbyin sreg gi cho ga sgrub pa bla na med pa thams cad bya ba la sems can thams cad zhi bar bya ba la nas dang yungs kar dang mar bsres la

shing arka'i me bus te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas pa tsam gyis dpag tshad kyi nang kun du zhi ba chen por 'gyur ro/ /yams kyi nad kyi gnod pa thams cad dang / 'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa

brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad stong kun tu zhi ba chen po'i las byas par 'gyur ro/ /rgyas pa byas na yungs kar dang / 'bras sA lu dang / kha ra dang / sbrang rtsi dang mar dang bsres te/ sbyin sreg bya ba ni lan bdun sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya kun du rgyas pa

chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya tshun chad rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na dpag tshad brgya stong kun du rgyas pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /shing dri mi zhim pa'i me bus te/ 'bras kyi phub ma dang /

lan tshwa dang / yungs kar mar dang bsres te shing tsher ma can gyi yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad byas na yid la ji ltar sems shing 'dod pa thams cad du mngon spyod kyi las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/ /

gsang sngags grub par 'dod na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ shing arka'i yam sreg shing gis me sbar te sbyin sreg lan bdun byas na rang gi khro bo'i gsang sngags sgrub pa grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan bcu bzhi

byas na don yod pa'i lcags kyu grub par 'gyur ro/ /nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg byas na don yod pa'i zhags pa'i snying po 'grub par 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod sbyin sreg byas na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi spyi

grub par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / nor bu'i rigs dang / pad+ma'i rigs dang / rdo rje'i rigs rnams so/ /gzhan yang khro bo chen po stong phrag brgya mchog tu grub pa chen por 'gyur ro/ /til dang / 'bras dang so ba dang /

zho dang / sbrang rtsi dang / mar rnams sbyar te chang pa bdun sbyin sreg byas na bram ze thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro/ /lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin la sogs pa lha thams cad lha'i tshogs dang bcas pa'ang 'ong zhing rig sngags 'chang ba la bsnyen bkur byed

cing dbang du 'gyur ro/ /nyi ma dang zla ba dag kyang 'ong bar 'gyur zhing rig sngags 'chang ba'i rkang pa la 'dud par 'gyur ro/ /gnod sbyin dang / srin po dbang du bya na 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams

mar dang bsres te sbyin sreg lan nyi shu rtsa gcig byas na gnod sbyin dang / srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro/ /klu char 'bebs par bya na 'bras yos dang / yungs kar dang / nA ga pus pa dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig

sbyin sreg byas na des na klu rnams char pa'i rgyun chen po 'bebs par 'gyur te/ ji tsam 'dod par char pa'i rgyun gtong zhing 'bebs so/ /shin tu char che ba gcod na de nyid kyi thal ba nam mkha' la gtor na shin tu char che ba gcod par 'gyur ro/ /pha rol gyi g.yul

bzlog par 'dod na ske tshe'i 'bru dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg bya'o/ /'thab pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed cing mtshang 'dru ba thams cad la pri yang ku'i me tog dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang

sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du rgyal bar 'gyur ro/ /'thab rtsod dang / 'gyed pa rnams kyi smra ba'i lan thebs par 'gyur ro/ /nad thams cad zhi bar bya ba la/ sran ku lan tha dang / zho dang sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg lan nyi

shu rtsa gcig byas na nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /bud med dbang du bya na su ma na'i me tog gis lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na bud med thams cad mchog tu dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin zhing thams cad du mchog grub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas sdig pa

thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang ba des 'bras sA lu dang / til dang / yungs kar dang / pad+ma'i 'dab ma dang / zho dang / sbrang rtsi rnams mar dang sbyar te/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas na sdig pa dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par

dag par 'gyur ro/ /'on te khro bo'i rgyal po sgrub par 'dod na seng ldeng gi phye ma dang / yungs kar dang / gu gul rnams mar dang sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na thams cad du khro bo'i gsang sngags grub pa chen po 'grub par 'gyur zhing khro bo'i gsang sngags thams cad spyan drangs
par 'gyur ro// //'phags pa don yod pa'i zhags pa'i cho ga zhib mo'i rgyal po/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa rdzogs so// //shu b+hamastu// //
